text_he: ויהי איש אחד מן-הרמתים צופים--מהר אפרים ושמו אלקנה בן-ירחם בן-אליהוא בן-תחו בן-צוף--אפרתי | Now there was a certain man of Ramathaim-zophim of the hill-country of Ephraim and his name was Elkanah the son of Jeroham the son of Elihu the son of Tohu the son of Zuph an Ephraimite | ויהי אחרי מות שאול ודוד שב מהכות את-העמלק וישב דוד בצקלג ימים שנים | And it came to pass after the death of Saul when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites and David had abode two days in Ziklag
text_en: Now there was a certain man of Ramathaim-zophim, of the hill-country of Ephraim, and his name was Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Elihu, the son of Tohu, the son of Zuph, an Ephraimite.
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי אִישׁ אֶחָד מִן-הָרָמָתַיִם, צוֹפִים--מֵהַר אֶפְרָיִם; וּשְׁמוֹ אֶלְקָנָה בֶּן-יְרֹחָם בֶּן-אֱלִיהוּא, בֶּן-תֹּחוּ בֶן-צוּף--אֶפְרָתִי. | Now there was a certain man of Ramathaim-zophim, of the hill-country of Ephraim, and his name was Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Elihu, the son of Tohu, the son of Zuph, an Ephraimite. | וַיְהִי, אַחֲרֵי מוֹת שָׁאוּל, וְדָוִד שָׁב, מֵהַכּוֹת אֶת-הָעֲמָלֵק; וַיֵּשֶׁב דָּוִד בְּצִקְלָג, יָמִים שְׁנָיִם. | And it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;

text_he: ולו שתי נשים--שם אחת חנה ושם השנית פנה ויהי לפנה ילדים ולחנה אין ילדים | And he had two wives the name of the one was Hannah and the name of the other Peninnah and Peninnah had children but Hannah had no children | ויהי ביום השלישי והנה איש בא מן-המחנה מעם שאול ובגדיו קרעים ואדמה על-ראשו ויהי באו אל-דוד ויפל ארצה וישתחו | it came even to pass on the third day that behold a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent and earth upon his head and so it was when he came to David that he fell to the earth and prostrated himself
text_en: And he had two wives: the name of the one was Hannah, and the name of the other Peninnah; and Peninnah had children, but Hannah had no children.
text_pisuk: וְלוֹ, שְׁתֵּי נָשִׁים--שֵׁם אַחַת חַנָּה, וְשֵׁם הַשֵּׁנִית פְּנִנָּה; וַיְהִי לִפְנִנָּה יְלָדִים, וּלְחַנָּה אֵין יְלָדִים. | And he had two wives: the name of the one was Hannah, and the name of the other Peninnah; and Peninnah had children, but Hannah had no children. | וַיְהִי בַּיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי, וְהִנֵּה אִישׁ בָּא מִן-הַמַּחֲנֶה מֵעִם שָׁאוּל, וּבְגָדָיו קְרֻעִים, וַאֲדָמָה עַל-רֹאשׁוֹ; וַיְהִי בְּבֹאוֹ אֶל-דָּוִד, וַיִּפֹּל אַרְצָה וַיִּשְׁתָּחוּ. | it came even to pass on the third day, that, behold, a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent, and earth upon his head; and so it was, when he came to David, that he fell to the earth, and prostrated himself.

text_he: ועלה האיש הוא מעירו מימים ימימה להשתחות ולזבח ליהוה צבאות בשלה ושם שני בני-עלי חפני ופנחס כהנים ליהוה | And this man went up out of his city from year to year to worship and to sacrifice unto the LORD of hosts in Shiloh And the two sons of Eli Hophni and Phinehas were there priests unto the LORD | ויאמר לו דוד אי מזה תבוא ויאמר אליו מחנה ישראל נמלטתי | And David said unto him 'From whence comest thou' And he said unto him 'Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped'
text_en: And this man went up out of his city from year to year to worship and to sacrifice unto the LORD of hosts in Shiloh. And the two sons of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were there priests unto the LORD.
text_pisuk: וְעָלָה הָאִישׁ הַהוּא מֵעִירוֹ מִיָּמִים יָמִימָה, לְהִשְׁתַּחֲות וְלִזְבֹּחַ לַיהוָה צְבָאוֹת בְּשִׁלֹה; וְשָׁם שְׁנֵי בְנֵי-עֵלִי, חָפְנִי וּפִנְחָס, כֹּהֲנִים, לַיהוָה. | And this man went up out of his city from year to year to worship and to sacrifice unto the LORD of hosts in Shiloh. And the two sons of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were there priests unto the LORD. | וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ דָּוִד, אֵי מִזֶּה תָּבוֹא; וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו, מִמַּחֲנֵה יִשְׂרָאֵל נִמְלָטְתִּי. | And David said unto him: 'From whence comest thou?' And he said unto him: 'Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped.'

text_he: ויהי היום ויזבח אלקנה ונתן לפנה אשתו ולכל-בניה ובנותיה--מנות | And it came to pass upon a day when Elkanah sacrificed that he gave to Peninnah his wife and to all her sons and her daughters portions | ויאמר אליו דוד מה-היה הדבר הגד-נא לי ויאמר אשר-נס העם מן-המלחמה וגם-הרבה נפל מן-העם וימתו וגם שאול ויהונתן בנו מתו | And David said unto him 'How went the matter I pray thee tell me' And he answered 'The people are fled from the battle and many of the people also are fallen and dead and Saul and Jonathan his son are dead also'
text_en: And it came to pass upon a day, when Elkanah sacrificed, that he gave to Peninnah his wife, and to all her sons and her daughters, portions;
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי הַיּוֹם, וַיִּזְבַּח אֶלְקָנָה; וְנָתַן לִפְנִנָּה אִשְׁתּוֹ, וּלְכָל-בָּנֶיהָ וּבְנוֹתֶיהָ--מָנוֹת. | And it came to pass upon a day, when Elkanah sacrificed, that he gave to Peninnah his wife, and to all her sons and her daughters, portions; | וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו דָּוִד מֶה-הָיָה הַדָּבָר, הַגֶּד-נָא לִי; וַיֹּאמֶר אֲשֶׁר-נָס הָעָם מִן-הַמִּלְחָמָה, וְגַם-הַרְבֵּה נָפַל מִן-הָעָם וַיָּמֻתוּ, וְגַם שָׁאוּל וִיהוֹנָתָן בְּנוֹ, מֵתוּ. | And David said unto him: 'How went the matter? I pray thee, tell me.' And he answered: 'The people are fled from the battle, and many of the people also are fallen and dead; and Saul and Jonathan his son are dead also.'

text_he: ולחנה יתן מנה אחת אפים כי את-חנה אהב ויהוה סגר רחמה | but unto Hannah he gave a double portion for he loved Hannah but the LORD had shut up her womb | ויאמר דוד אל-הנער המגיד לו איך ידעת כי-מת שאול ויהונתן בנו | And David said unto the young man that told him 'How knowest thou that Saul and Jonathan his son are dead'
text_en: but unto Hannah he gave a double portion; for he loved Hannah, but the LORD had shut up her womb.
text_pisuk: וּלְחַנָּה, יִתֵּן מָנָה אַחַת אַפָּיִם: כִּי אֶת-חַנָּה אָהֵב, וַיהוָה סָגַר רַחְמָהּ. | but unto Hannah he gave a double portion; for he loved Hannah, but the LORD had shut up her womb. | וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִד, אֶל-הַנַּעַר הַמַּגִּיד לוֹ: אֵיךְ יָדַעְתָּ, כִּי-מֵת שָׁאוּל וִיהוֹנָתָן בְּנוֹ. | And David said unto the young man that told him: 'How knowest thou that Saul and Jonathan his son are dead?'

text_he: וכעסתה צרתה גם-כעס בעבור הרעמה כי-סגר יהוה בעד רחמה | And her rival vexed her sore to make her fret because the LORD had shut up her womb | ויאמר הנער המגיד לו נקרא נקריתי בהר הגלבע והנה שאול נשען על-חניתו והנה הרכב ובעלי הפרשים הדבקהו | And the young man that told him said 'As I happened by chance upon mount Gilboa behold Saul leaned upon his spear and lo the chariots and the horsemen pressed hard upon him
text_en: And her rival vexed her sore, to make her fret, because the LORD had shut up her womb.
text_pisuk: וְכִעֲסַתָּה צָרָתָהּ גַּם-כַּעַס, בַּעֲבוּר הַרְּעִמָהּ: כִּי-סָגַר יְהוָה, בְּעַד רַחְמָהּ. | And her rival vexed her sore, to make her fret, because the LORD had shut up her womb. | וַיֹּאמֶר הַנַּעַר הַמַּגִּיד לוֹ, נִקְרֹא נִקְרֵיתִי בְּהַר הַגִּלְבֹּעַ, וְהִנֵּה שָׁאוּל, נִשְׁעָן עַל-חֲנִיתוֹ; וְהִנֵּה הָרֶכֶב וּבַעֲלֵי הַפָּרָשִׁים, הִדְבִּקֻהוּ. | And the young man that told him said: 'As I happened by chance upon mount Gilboa, behold, Saul leaned upon his spear; and, lo, the chariots and the horsemen pressed hard upon him.

text_he: וכן יעשה שנה בשנה מדי עלתה בית יהוה--כן תכעסנה ותבכה ולא תאכל | And as he did so year by year when she went up to the house of the LORD so she vexed her therefore she wept and would not eat | ויפן אחריו ויראני ויקרא אלי ואמר הני | And when he looked behind him he saw me and called unto me And I answered Here am I
text_en: And as he did so year by year, when she went up to the house of the LORD, so she vexed her; therefore she wept, and would not eat.
text_pisuk: וְכֵן יַעֲשֶׂה שָׁנָה בְשָׁנָה, מִדֵּי עֲלֹתָהּ בְּבֵית יְהוָה--כֵּן, תַּכְעִסֶנָּה; וַתִּבְכֶּה, וְלֹא תֹאכַל. | And as he did so year by year, when she went up to the house of the LORD, so she vexed her; therefore she wept, and would not eat. | וַיִּפֶן אַחֲרָיו, וַיִּרְאֵנִי; וַיִּקְרָא אֵלַי, וָאֹמַר הִנֵּנִי. | And when he looked behind him, he saw me, and called unto me. And I answered: Here am I.

text_he: ויאמר לה אלקנה אישה חנה למה תבכי ולמה לא תאכלי ולמה ירע לבך הלוא אנכי טוב לך מעשרה בנים | And Elkanah her husband said unto her 'Hannah why weepest thou and why eatest thou not and why is thy heart grieved am not I better to thee than ten sons' | ויאמר לי מי-אתה ויאמר (ואמר) אליו עמלקי אנכי | And he said unto me Who art thou And I answered him I am an Amalekite
text_en: And Elkanah her husband said unto her: 'Hannah, why weepest thou? and why eatest thou not? and why is thy heart grieved? am not I better to thee than ten sons?'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר לָהּ אֶלְקָנָה אִישָׁהּ, חַנָּה לָמֶה תִבְכִּי וְלָמֶה לֹא תֹאכְלִי, וְלָמֶה, יֵרַע לְבָבֵךְ: הֲלוֹא אָנֹכִי טוֹב לָךְ, מֵעֲשָׂרָה בָּנִים. | And Elkanah her husband said unto her: 'Hannah, why weepest thou? and why eatest thou not? and why is thy heart grieved? am not I better to thee than ten sons?' | וַיֹּאמֶר לִי, מִי-אָתָּה; ויאמר (וָאֹמַר) אֵלָיו, עֲמָלֵקִי אָנֹכִי. | And he said unto me: Who art thou? And I answered him: I am an Amalekite.

text_he: ותקם חנה אחרי אכלה בשלה ואחרי שתה ועלי הכהן ישב על-הכסא על-מזוזת היכל יהוה | So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh and after they had drunk--now Eli the priest sat upon his seat by the door-post of the temple of the LORD | ויאמר אלי עמד-נא עלי ומתני--כי אחזני השבץ כי-כל-עוד נפשי בי | And he said unto me Stand I pray thee beside me and slay me for the agony hath taken hold of me because my life is just yet in me
text_en: So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh, and after they had drunk--now Eli the priest sat upon his seat by the door-post of the temple of the LORD;
text_pisuk: וַתָּקָם חַנָּה, אַחֲרֵי אָכְלָה בְשִׁלֹה וְאַחֲרֵי שָׁתֹה; וְעֵלִי הַכֹּהֵן, יֹשֵׁב עַל-הַכִּסֵּא, עַל-מְזוּזַת, הֵיכַל יְהוָה. | So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh, and after they had drunk--now Eli the priest sat upon his seat by the door-post of the temple of the LORD; | וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלַי, עֲמָד-נָא עָלַי וּמֹתְתֵנִי--כִּי אֲחָזַנִי, הַשָּׁבָץ: כִּי-כָל-עוֹד נַפְשִׁי, בִּי. | And he said unto me: Stand, I pray thee, beside me, and slay me, for the agony hath taken hold of me; because my life is just yet in me.

text_he: והיא מרת נפש ותפל על-יהוה ובכה תבכה | and she was in bitterness of soul--and prayed unto the LORD and wept sore | ואעמד עליו ואמתהו--כי ידעתי כי לא יחיה אחרי נפלו ואקח הנזר אשר על-ראשו ואצעדה אשר על-זרעו ואביאם אל-אדני הנה | So I stood beside him and slew him because I was sure that he could not live after that he was fallen and I took the crown that was upon his head and the bracelet that was on his arm and have brought them hither unto my lord'
text_en: and she was in bitterness of soul--and prayed unto the LORD, and wept sore.
text_pisuk: וְהִיא, מָרַת נָפֶשׁ; וַתִּתְפַּלֵּל עַל-יְהוָה, וּבָכֹה תִבְכֶּה. | and she was in bitterness of soul--and prayed unto the LORD, and wept sore. | וָאֶעֱמֹד עָלָיו, וַאֲמֹתְתֵהוּ--כִּי יָדַעְתִּי, כִּי לֹא יִחְיֶה אַחֲרֵי נִפְלוֹ; וָאֶקַּח הַנֵּזֶר אֲשֶׁר עַל-רֹאשׁוֹ, וְאֶצְעָדָה אֲשֶׁר עַל-זְרֹעוֹ, וָאֲבִיאֵם אֶל-אֲדֹנִי, הֵנָּה. | So I stood beside him, and slew him, because I was sure that he could not live after that he was fallen; and I took the crown that was upon his head, and the bracelet that was on his arm, and have brought them hither unto my lord.'

text_he: ותדר נדר ותאמר יהוה צבאות אם-ראה תראה בעני אמתך וזכרתני ולא-תשכח את-אמתך ונתה לאמתך זרע אנשים--ונתיו ליהוה כל-ימי חיו ומורה לא-יעלה על-ראשו | And she vowed a vow and said 'O LORD of hosts if Thou wilt indeed look on the affliction of Thy handmaid and remember me and not forget Thy handmaid but wilt give unto Thy handmaid a man-child then I will give him unto the LORD all the days of his life and there shall no razor come upon his head' | ויחזק דוד בגדו ויקרעם וגם כל-האנשים אשר אתו | Then David took hold on his clothes and rent them and likewise all the men that were with him
text_en: And she vowed a vow, and said: 'O LORD of hosts, if Thou wilt indeed look on the affliction of Thy handmaid, and remember me, and not forget Thy handmaid, but wilt give unto Thy handmaid a man-child, then I will give him unto the LORD all the days of his life, and there shall no razor come upon his head.'
text_pisuk: וַתִּדֹּר נֶדֶר וַתֹּאמַר, יְהוָה צְבָאוֹת אִם-רָאֹה תִרְאֶה בָּעֳנִי אֲמָתֶךָ וּזְכַרְתַּנִי וְלֹא-תִשְׁכַּח אֶת-אֲמָתֶךָ, וְנָתַתָּה לַאֲמָתְךָ, זֶרַע אֲנָשִׁים--וּנְתַתִּיו לַיהוָה כָּל-יְמֵי חַיָּיו, וּמוֹרָה לֹא-יַעֲלֶה עַל-רֹאשׁוֹ. | And she vowed a vow, and said: 'O LORD of hosts, if Thou wilt indeed look on the affliction of Thy handmaid, and remember me, and not forget Thy handmaid, but wilt give unto Thy handmaid a man-child, then I will give him unto the LORD all the days of his life, and there shall no razor come upon his head.' | וַיַּחֲזֵק דָּוִד בִּבְגָדָו, וַיִּקְרָעֵם; וְגַם כָּל-הָאֲנָשִׁים, אֲשֶׁר אִתּוֹ. | Then David took hold on his clothes, and rent them; and likewise all the men that were with him.

text_he: והיה כי הרבתה להתפל לפני יהוה ועלי שמר את-פיה | And it came to pass as she prayed long before the LORD that Eli watched her mouth | ויספדו ויבכו ויצמו עד-הערב על-שאול ועל-יהונתן בנו ועל-עם יהוה ועל-בית ישראל--כי נפלו בחרב | And they wailed and wept and fasted until even for Saul and for Jonathan his son and for the people of the LORD and for the house of Israel because they were fallen by the sword
text_en: And it came to pass, as she prayed long before the LORD, that Eli watched her mouth.
text_pisuk: וְהָיָה כִּי הִרְבְּתָה, לְהִתְפַּלֵּל לִפְנֵי יְהוָה; וְעֵלִי, שֹׁמֵר אֶת-פִּיהָ. | And it came to pass, as she prayed long before the LORD, that Eli watched her mouth. | וַיִּסְפְּדוּ, וַיִּבְכּוּ, וַיָּצֻמוּ, עַד-הָעָרֶב: עַל-שָׁאוּל וְעַל-יְהוֹנָתָן בְּנוֹ, וְעַל-עַם יְהוָה וְעַל-בֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל--כִּי נָפְלוּ, בֶּחָרֶב. | And they wailed, and wept, and fasted until even, for Saul, and for Jonathan his son, and for the people of the LORD, and for the house of Israel; because they were fallen by the sword.

text_he: וחנה היא מדברת על-לבה--רק שפתיה נעות וקולה לא ישמע ויחשבה עלי לשכרה | Now Hannah she spoke in her heart only her lips moved but her voice could not be heard therefore Eli thought she had been drunken | ויאמר דוד אל-הנער המגיד לו אי מזה אתה ויאמר בן-איש גר עמלקי אנכי | And David said unto the young man that told him 'Whence art thou' And he answered 'I am the son of an Amalekite stranger'
text_en: Now Hannah, she spoke in her heart; only her lips moved, but her voice could not be heard; therefore, Eli thought she had been drunken.
text_pisuk: וְחַנָּה, הִיא מְדַבֶּרֶת עַל-לִבָּהּ--רַק שְׂפָתֶיהָ נָּעוֹת, וְקוֹלָהּ לֹא יִשָּׁמֵעַ; וַיַּחְשְׁבֶהָ עֵלִי, לְשִׁכֹּרָה. | Now Hannah, she spoke in her heart; only her lips moved, but her voice could not be heard; therefore, Eli thought she had been drunken. | וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִד, אֶל-הַנַּעַר הַמַּגִּיד לוֹ, אֵי מִזֶּה, אָתָּה; וַיֹּאמֶר, בֶּן-אִישׁ גֵּר עֲמָלֵקִי אָנֹכִי. | And David said unto the young man that told him: 'Whence art thou?' And he answered: 'I am the son of an Amalekite stranger.'

text_he: ויאמר אליה עלי עד-מתי תשתכרין הסירי את-ינך מעליך | And Eli said unto her 'How long wilt thou be drunken put away thy wine from thee' | ויאמר אליו דוד איך לא יראת לשלח ידך לשחת את-משיח יהוה | And David said unto him 'How wast thou not afraid to put forth thy hand to destroy the LORD'S anointed'
text_en: And Eli said unto her: 'How long wilt thou be drunken? put away thy wine from thee.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלֶיהָ עֵלִי, עַד-מָתַי תִּשְׁתַּכָּרִין; הָסִירִי אֶת-יֵינֵךְ, מֵעָלָיִךְ. | And Eli said unto her: 'How long wilt thou be drunken? put away thy wine from thee.' | וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו, דָּוִד: אֵיךְ, לֹא יָרֵאתָ, לִשְׁלֹחַ יָדְךָ, לְשַׁחֵת אֶת-מְשִׁיחַ יְהוָה. | And David said unto him: 'How wast thou not afraid to put forth thy hand to destroy the LORD'S anointed?'

text_he: ותען חנה ותאמר לא אדני אשה קשת-רוח אנכי וין ושכר לא שתיתי ואשפך את-נפשי לפני יהוה | And Hannah answered and said 'No my lord I am a woman of a sorrowful spirit I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink but I poured out my soul before the LORD | ויקרא דוד לאחד מהנערים ויאמר גש פגע-בו ויכהו וימת | And David called one of the young men and said 'Go near and fall upon him' And he smote him that he died
text_en: And Hannah answered and said: 'No, my lord, I am a woman of a sorrowful spirit; I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink, but I poured out my soul before the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַתַּעַן חַנָּה וַתֹּאמֶר, לֹא אֲדֹנִי, אִשָּׁה קְשַׁת-רוּחַ אָנֹכִי, וְיַיִן וְשֵׁכָר לֹא שָׁתִיתִי; וָאֶשְׁפֹּךְ אֶת-נַפְשִׁי, לִפְנֵי יְהוָה. | And Hannah answered and said: 'No, my lord, I am a woman of a sorrowful spirit; I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink, but I poured out my soul before the LORD. | וַיִּקְרָא דָוִד, לְאַחַד מֵהַנְּעָרִים, וַיֹּאמֶר, גַּשׁ פְּגַע-בּוֹ; וַיַּכֵּהוּ, וַיָּמֹת. | And David called one of the young men, and said: 'Go near, and fall upon him.' And he smote him that he died.

text_he: אל-תן את-אמתך לפני בת-בליעל כי-מרב שיחי וכעסי דברתי עד-הנה | Count not thy handmaid for a wicked woman for out of the abundance of my complaint and my vexation have I spoken hitherto' | ויאמר אליו דוד דמיך (דמך) על-ראשך כי פיך ענה בך לאמר אנכי מתי את-משיח יהוה | And David said unto him 'Thy blood be upon thy head for thy mouth hath testified against thee saying I have slain the LORD'S anointed'
text_en: Count not thy handmaid for a wicked woman: for out of the abundance of my complaint and my vexation have I spoken hitherto.'
text_pisuk: אַל-תִּתֵּן, אֶת-אֲמָתְךָ, לִפְנֵי, בַּת-בְּלִיָּעַל: כִּי-מֵרֹב שִׂיחִי וְכַעְסִי, דִּבַּרְתִּי עַד-הֵנָּה. | Count not thy handmaid for a wicked woman: for out of the abundance of my complaint and my vexation have I spoken hitherto.' | וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו דָּוִד, דמיך (דָּמְךָ) עַל-רֹאשֶׁךָ: כִּי פִיךָ, עָנָה בְךָ לֵאמֹר, אָנֹכִי מֹתַתִּי, אֶת-מְשִׁיחַ יְהוָה. | And David said unto him: 'Thy blood be upon thy head; for thy mouth hath testified against thee, saying: I have slain the LORD'S anointed.'

text_he: ויען עלי ויאמר לכי לשלום ואלהי ישראל יתן את-שלתך אשר שאלת מעמו | Then Eli answered and said 'Go in peace and the God of Israel grant thy petition that thou hast asked of Him' | ויקנן דוד את-הקינה הזאת על-שאול ועל-יהונתן בנו | And David lamented with this lamentation over Saul and over Jonathan his son
text_en: Then Eli answered and said: 'Go in peace, and the God of Israel grant thy petition that thou hast asked of Him.'
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַן עֵלִי וַיֹּאמֶר, לְכִי לְשָׁלוֹם; וֵאלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, יִתֵּן אֶת-שֵׁלָתֵךְ, אֲשֶׁר שָׁאַלְתְּ, מֵעִמּוֹ. | Then Eli answered and said: 'Go in peace, and the God of Israel grant thy petition that thou hast asked of Him.' | וַיְקֹנֵן דָּוִד, אֶת-הַקִּינָה הַזֹּאת, עַל-שָׁאוּל, וְעַל-יְהוֹנָתָן בְּנוֹ. | And David lamented with this lamentation over Saul and over Jonathan his son,

text_he: ותאמר תמצא שפחתך חן בעיניך ותלך האשה לדרכה ותאכל ופניה לא-היו-לה עוד | And she said 'Let thy servant find favour in thy sight' So the woman went her way and did eat and her countenance was no more sad | ויאמר למד בני-יהודה קשת הנה כתובה על-ספר הישר | and said--To teach the sons of Judah the bow Behold it is written in the book of Jashar
text_en: And she said: 'Let thy servant find favour in thy sight.' So the woman went her way, and did eat, and her countenance was no more sad.
text_pisuk: וַתֹּאמֶר, תִּמְצָא שִׁפְחָתְךָ חֵן בְּעֵינֶיךָ; וַתֵּלֶךְ הָאִשָּׁה לְדַרְכָּהּ וַתֹּאכַל, וּפָנֶיהָ לֹא-הָיוּ-לָהּ עוֹד. | And she said: 'Let thy servant find favour in thy sight.' So the woman went her way, and did eat, and her countenance was no more sad. | וַיֹּאמֶר, לְלַמֵּד בְּנֵי-יְהוּדָה קָשֶׁת, הִנֵּה כְתוּבָה, עַל-סֵפֶר הַיָּשָׁר. | and said--To teach the sons of Judah the bow. Behold, it is written in the book of Jashar:

text_he: וישכמו בקר וישתחו לפני יהוה וישבו ויבאו אל-ביתם הרמתה וידע אלקנה את-חנה אשתו ויזכרה יהוה | And they rose up in the morning early and worshipped before the LORD and returned and came to their house to Ramah and Elkanah knew Hannah his wife and the LORD remembered her | הצבי ישראל על-במותיך חל איך נפלו גבורים | Thy beauty O Israel upon thy high places is slain How are the mighty fallen
text_en: And they rose up in the morning early, and worshipped before the LORD, and returned, and came to their house to Ramah; and Elkanah knew Hannah his wife; and the LORD remembered her.
text_pisuk: וַיַּשְׁכִּמוּ בַבֹּקֶר, וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ לִפְנֵי יְהוָה, וַיָּשֻׁבוּ וַיָּבֹאוּ אֶל-בֵּיתָם, הָרָמָתָה; וַיֵּדַע אֶלְקָנָה אֶת-חַנָּה אִשְׁתּוֹ, וַיִּזְכְּרֶהָ יְהוָה. | And they rose up in the morning early, and worshipped before the LORD, and returned, and came to their house to Ramah; and Elkanah knew Hannah his wife; and the LORD remembered her. | הַצְּבִי, יִשְׂרָאֵל, עַל-בָּמוֹתֶיךָ, חָלָל: אֵיךְ, נָפְלוּ גִבּוֹרִים. | Thy beauty, O Israel, upon thy high places is slain! How are the mighty fallen!

text_he: ויהי לתקפות הימים ותהר חנה ותלד בן ותקרא את-שמו שמואל כי מיהוה שאלתיו | And it came to pass when the time was come about that Hannah conceived and bore a son and she called his name Samuel 'because I have asked him of the LORD' | אל-תגידו בגת אל-תבשרו בחוצת אשקלון פן-תשמחנה בנות פלשתים פן-תעלזנה בנות הערלים | Tell it not in Gath publish it not in the streets of Ashkelon lest the daughters of the Philistines rejoice lest the daughters of the uncircumcised triumph
text_en: And it came to pass, when the time was come about, that Hannah conceived, and bore a son; and she called his name Samuel: 'because I have asked him of the LORD.'
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי לִתְקֻפוֹת הַיָּמִים, וַתַּהַר חַנָּה וַתֵּלֶד בֵּן; וַתִּקְרָא אֶת-שְׁמוֹ שְׁמוּאֵל, כִּי מֵיְהוָה שְׁאִלְתִּיו. | And it came to pass, when the time was come about, that Hannah conceived, and bore a son; and she called his name Samuel: 'because I have asked him of the LORD.' | אַל-תַּגִּידוּ בְגַת, אַל-תְּבַשְּׂרוּ בְּחוּצֹת אַשְׁקְלוֹן: פֶּן-תִּשְׂמַחְנָה בְּנוֹת פְּלִשְׁתִּים, פֶּן-תַּעֲלֹזְנָה בְּנוֹת הָעֲרֵלִים. | Tell it not in Gath, publish it not in the streets of Ashkelon; lest the daughters of the Philistines rejoice, lest the daughters of the uncircumcised triumph.

text_he: ויעל האיש אלקנה וכל-ביתו לזבח ליהוה את-זבח הימים ואת-נדרו | And the man Elkanah and all his house went up to offer unto the LORD the yearly sacrifice and his vow | הרי בגלבע אל-טל ואל-מטר עליכם--ושדי תרומת כי שם נגעל מגן גבורים--מגן שאול בלי משיח בשמן | Ye mountains of Gilboa let there be no dew nor rain upon you neither fields of choice fruits for there the shield of the mighty was vilely cast away the shield of Saul not anointed with oil
text_en: And the man Elkanah, and all his house, went up to offer unto the LORD the yearly sacrifice, and his vow.
text_pisuk: וַיַּעַל הָאִישׁ אֶלְקָנָה, וְכָל-בֵּיתוֹ, לִזְבֹּחַ לַיהוָה אֶת-זֶבַח הַיָּמִים, וְאֶת-נִדְרוֹ. | And the man Elkanah, and all his house, went up to offer unto the LORD the yearly sacrifice, and his vow. | הָרֵי בַגִּלְבֹּעַ, אַל-טַל וְאַל-מָטָר עֲלֵיכֶם--וּשְׂדֵי תְרוּמֹת: כִּי שָׁם נִגְעַל, מָגֵן גִּבּוֹרִים--מָגֵן שָׁאוּל, בְּלִי מָשִׁיחַ בַּשָּׁמֶן. | Ye mountains of Gilboa, let there be no dew nor rain upon you, neither fields of choice fruits; for there the shield of the mighty was vilely cast away, the shield of Saul, not anointed with oil.

text_he: וחנה לא עלתה כי-אמרה לאישה עד יגמל הנער והבאתיו ונראה את-פני יהוה וישב שם עד-עולם | But Hannah went not up for she said unto her husband 'Until the child be weaned when I will bring him that he may appear before the LORD and there abide for ever' | מדם חלים מחלב גבורים--קשת יהונתן לא נשוג אחור וחרב שאול לא תשוב ריקם | From the blood of the slain from the fat of the mighty the bow of Jonathan turned not back and the sword of Saul returned not empty
text_en: But Hannah went not up; for she said unto her husband: 'Until the child be weaned, when I will bring him, that he may appear before the LORD, and there abide for ever.'
text_pisuk: וְחַנָּה, לֹא עָלָתָה: כִּי-אָמְרָה לְאִישָׁהּ, עַד יִגָּמֵל הַנַּעַר וַהֲבִאֹתִיו וְנִרְאָה אֶת-פְּנֵי יְהוָה, וְיָשַׁב שָׁם, עַד-עוֹלָם. | But Hannah went not up; for she said unto her husband: 'Until the child be weaned, when I will bring him, that he may appear before the LORD, and there abide for ever.' | מִדַּם חֲלָלִים, מֵחֵלֶב גִּבּוֹרִים--קֶשֶׁת יְהוֹנָתָן, לֹא נָשׂוֹג אָחוֹר; וְחֶרֶב שָׁאוּל, לֹא תָשׁוּב רֵיקָם. | From the blood of the slain, from the fat of the mighty, the bow of Jonathan turned not back, and the sword of Saul returned not empty.

text_he: ויאמר לה אלקנה אישה עשי הטוב בעיניך שבי עד-גמלך אתו--אך יקם יהוה את-דברו ותשב האשה ותינק את-בנה עד-גמלה אתו | And Elkanah her husband said unto her 'Do what seemeth thee good tarry until thou have weaned him only the LORD establish His word' So the woman tarried and gave her son suck until she weaned him | שאול ויהונתן הנאהבים והנעימם בחיהם ובמותם לא נפרדו מנשרים קלו מאריות גברו | Saul and Jonathan the lovely and the pleasant in their lives even in their death they were not divided they were swifter than eagles they were stronger than lions
text_en: And Elkanah her husband said unto her: 'Do what seemeth thee good; tarry until thou have weaned him; only the LORD establish His word.' So the woman tarried and gave her son suck, until she weaned him.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר לָהּ אֶלְקָנָה אִישָׁהּ עֲשִׂי הַטּוֹב בְּעֵינַיִךְ, שְׁבִי עַד-גָּמְלֵךְ אֹתוֹ--אַךְ יָקֵם יְהוָה, אֶת-דְּבָרוֹ; וַתֵּשֶׁב הָאִשָּׁה וַתֵּינֶק אֶת-בְּנָהּ, עַד-גָמְלָהּ אֹתוֹ. | And Elkanah her husband said unto her: 'Do what seemeth thee good; tarry until thou have weaned him; only the LORD establish His word.' So the woman tarried and gave her son suck, until she weaned him. | שָׁאוּל וִיהוֹנָתָן, הַנֶּאֱהָבִים וְהַנְּעִימִם בְּחַיֵּיהֶם, וּבְמוֹתָם, לֹא נִפְרָדוּ; מִנְּשָׁרִים קַלּוּ, מֵאֲרָיוֹת גָּבֵרוּ. | Saul and Jonathan, the lovely and the pleasant in their lives, even in their death they were not divided; they were swifter than eagles, they were stronger than lions.

text_he: ותעלהו עמה כאשר גמלתו בפרים שלשה ואיפה אחת קמח ונבל ין ותבאהו בית-יהוה שלו והנער נער | And when she had weaned him she took him up with her with three bullocks and one ephah of meal and a bottle of wine and brought him unto the house of the LORD in Shiloh and the child was young | בנות ישראל--אל-שאול בכינה המלבשכם שני עם-עדנים המעלה עדי זהב על לבושכן | Ye daughters of Israel weep over Saul who clothed you in scarlet with other delights who put ornaments of gold upon your apparel
text_en: And when she had weaned him, she took him up with her, with three bullocks, and one ephah of meal, and a bottle of wine, and brought him unto the house of the LORD in Shiloh; and the child was young.
text_pisuk: וַתַּעֲלֵהוּ עִמָּהּ כַּאֲשֶׁר גְּמָלַתּוּ, בְּפָרִים שְׁלֹשָׁה וְאֵיפָה אַחַת קֶמַח וְנֵבֶל יַיִן, וַתְּבִאֵהוּ בֵית-יְהוָה, שִׁלוֹ; וְהַנַּעַר, נָעַר. | And when she had weaned him, she took him up with her, with three bullocks, and one ephah of meal, and a bottle of wine, and brought him unto the house of the LORD in Shiloh; and the child was young. | בְּנוֹת, יִשְׂרָאֵל--אֶל-שָׁאוּל, בְּכֶינָה; הַמַּלְבִּשְׁכֶם שָׁנִי, עִם-עֲדָנִים, הַמַּעֲלֶה עֲדִי זָהָב, עַל לְבוּשְׁכֶן. | Ye daughters of Israel, weep over Saul, who clothed you in scarlet, with other delights, who put ornaments of gold upon your apparel.

text_he: וישחטו את-הפר ויבאו את-הנער אל-עלי | And when the bullock was slain the child was brought to Eli | איך נפלו גברים בתוך המלחמה--יהונתן על-במותיך חל | How are the mighty fallen in the midst of the battle Jonathan upon thy high places is slain
text_en: And when the bullock was slain, the child was brought to Eli.
text_pisuk: וַיִּשְׁחֲטוּ, אֶת-הַפָּר; וַיָּבִאוּ אֶת-הַנַּעַר, אֶל-עֵלִי. | And when the bullock was slain, the child was brought to Eli. | אֵיךְ נָפְלוּ גִבֹּרִים, בְּתוֹךְ הַמִּלְחָמָה--יְהוֹנָתָן, עַל-בָּמוֹתֶיךָ חָלָל. | How are the mighty fallen in the midst of the battle! Jonathan upon thy high places is slain!

text_he: ותאמר בי אדני חי נפשך אדני אני האשה הנצבת עמכה בזה להתפל אל-יהוה | And she said 'Oh my lord as thy soul liveth my lord I am the woman that stood by thee here praying unto the LORD | צר-לי עליך אחי יהונתן--נעמת לי מאד נפלאתה אהבתך לי מאהבת נשים | I am distressed for thee my brother Jonathan very pleasant hast thou been unto me wonderful was thy love to me passing the love of women
text_en: And she said: 'Oh, my lord, as thy soul liveth, my lord, I am the woman that stood by thee here, praying unto the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַתֹּאמֶר בִּי אֲדֹנִי, חֵי נַפְשְׁךָ אֲדֹנִי; אֲנִי הָאִשָּׁה, הַנִּצֶּבֶת עִמְּכָה בָּזֶה, לְהִתְפַּלֵּל, אֶל-יְהוָה. | And she said: 'Oh, my lord, as thy soul liveth, my lord, I am the woman that stood by thee here, praying unto the LORD. | צַר-לִי עָלֶיךָ, אָחִי יְהוֹנָתָן--נָעַמְתָּ לִּי, מְאֹד; נִפְלְאַתָה אַהֲבָתְךָ לִי, מֵאַהֲבַת נָשִׁים. | I am distressed for thee, my brother Jonathan; very pleasant hast thou been unto me; wonderful was thy love to me, passing the love of women.

text_he: אל-הנער הזה התפלתי ויתן יהוה לי את-שאלתי אשר שאלתי מעמו | For this child I prayed and the LORD hath granted me my petition which I asked of Him | איך נפלו גבורים ויאבדו כלי מלחמה | How are the mighty fallen and the weapons of war perished
text_en: For this child I prayed; and the LORD hath granted me my petition which I asked of Him;
text_pisuk: אֶל-הַנַּעַר הַזֶּה, הִתְפַּלָּלְתִּי; וַיִּתֵּן יְהוָה לִי אֶת-שְׁאֵלָתִי, אֲשֶׁר שָׁאַלְתִּי מֵעִמּוֹ. | For this child I prayed; and the LORD hath granted me my petition which I asked of Him; | אֵיךְ נָפְלוּ גִבּוֹרִים, וַיֹּאבְדוּ כְּלֵי מִלְחָמָה. | How are the mighty fallen, and the weapons of war perished!

text_he: וגם אנכי השאלתהו ליהוה כל-הימים אשר היה הוא שאול ליהוה וישתחו שם ליהוה
text_en: therefore I also have lent him to the LORD; as long as he liveth he is lent to the LORD.' And he worshipped the LORD there.{S}
text_pisuk: וְגַם אָנֹכִי, הִשְׁאִלְתִּהוּ לַיהוָה, כָּל-הַיָּמִים אֲשֶׁר הָיָה, הוּא שָׁאוּל לַיהוָה; וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ שָׁם, לַיהוָה.

text_he: ותפל חנה ותאמר עלץ לבי ביהוה רמה קרני ביהוה רחב פי על-אויבי כי שמחתי בישועתך | And Hannah prayed and said my heart exulteth in the LORD my horn is exalted in the LORD my mouth is enlarged over mine enemies because I rejoice in Thy salvation | ויהי אחרי-כן וישאל דוד ביהוה לאמר האעלה באחת ערי יהודה ויאמר יהוה אליו עלה ויאמר דוד אנה אעלה ויאמר חברנה | And it came to pass after this that David inquired of the LORD saying 'Shall I go up into any of the cities of Judah' And the LORD said unto him 'Go up' And David said 'Whither shall I go up' And He said 'Unto Hebron'
text_en: And Hannah prayed, and said: my heart exulteth in the LORD, my horn is exalted in the LORD; my mouth is enlarged over mine enemies; because I rejoice in Thy salvation.
text_pisuk: וַתִּתְפַּלֵּל חַנָּה, וַתֹּאמַר, עָלַץ לִבִּי בַּיהוָה, רָמָה קַרְנִי בַּיהוָה; רָחַב פִּי עַל-אוֹיְבַי, כִּי שָׂמַחְתִּי בִּישׁוּעָתֶךָ. | And Hannah prayed, and said: my heart exulteth in the LORD, my horn is exalted in the LORD; my mouth is enlarged over mine enemies; because I rejoice in Thy salvation. | וַיְהִי אַחֲרֵי-כֵן, וַיִּשְׁאַל דָּוִד בַּיהוָה לֵאמֹר הַאֶעֱלֶה בְּאַחַת עָרֵי יְהוּדָה, וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֵלָיו, עֲלֵה; וַיֹּאמֶר דָּוִד אָנָה אֶעֱלֶה, וַיֹּאמֶר חֶבְרֹנָה. | And it came to pass after this, that David inquired of the LORD, saying: 'Shall I go up into any of the cities of Judah?' And the LORD said unto him: 'Go up.' And David said: 'Whither shall I go up?' And He said: 'Unto Hebron.'

text_he: אין-קדוש כיהוה כי אין בלתך ואין צור כאלהינו | There is none holy as the LORD for there is none beside Thee neither is there any rock like our God | ויעל שם דוד וגם שתי נשיו--אחינעם היזרעלית ואביגיל אשת נבל הכרמלי | So David went up thither and his two wives also Ahinoam the Jezreelitess and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite
text_en: There is none holy as the LORD, for there is none beside Thee; neither is there any rock like our God.
text_pisuk: אֵין-קָדוֹשׁ כַּיהוָה, כִּי אֵין בִּלְתֶּךָ; וְאֵין צוּר, כֵּאלֹהֵינוּ. | There is none holy as the LORD, for there is none beside Thee; neither is there any rock like our God. | וַיַּעַל שָׁם דָּוִד, וְגַם שְׁתֵּי נָשָׁיו--אֲחִינֹעַם, הַיִּזְרְעֵלִית, וַאֲבִיגַיִל, אֵשֶׁת נָבָל הַכַּרְמְלִי. | So David went up thither, and his two wives also, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.

text_he: אל-תרבו תדברו גבה גבה יצא עתק מפיכם כי אל דעות יהוה ולא (ולו) נתכנו עלות | Multiply not exceeding proud talk let not arrogancy come out of your mouth for the LORD is a God of knowledge and by Him actions are weighed | ואנשיו אשר-עמו העלה דוד איש וביתו וישבו בערי חברון | And his men that were with him did David bring up every man with his household and they dwelt in the cities of Hebron
text_en: Multiply not exceeding proud talk; let not arrogancy come out of your mouth; for the LORD is a God of knowledge, and by Him actions are weighed.
text_pisuk: אַל-תַּרְבּוּ תְדַבְּרוּ גְּבֹהָה גְבֹהָה, יֵצֵא עָתָק מִפִּיכֶם: כִּי אֵל דֵּעוֹת יְהוָה, ולא (וְלוֹ) נִתְכְּנוּ עֲלִלוֹת. | Multiply not exceeding proud talk; let not arrogancy come out of your mouth; for the LORD is a God of knowledge, and by Him actions are weighed. | וַאֲנָשָׁיו אֲשֶׁר-עִמּוֹ הֶעֱלָה דָוִד, אִישׁ וּבֵיתוֹ; וַיֵּשְׁבוּ, בְּעָרֵי חֶבְרוֹן. | And his men that were with him did David bring up, every man with his household; and they dwelt in the cities of Hebron.

text_he: קשת גברים חתים ונכשלים אזרו חיל | The bows of the mighty men are broken and they that stumbled are girded with strength | ויבאו אנשי יהודה וימשחו-שם את-דוד למלך על-בית יהודה ויגדו לדוד לאמר אנשי יביש גלעד אשר קברו את-שאול | And the men of Judah came and they there anointed David king over the house of Judah And they told David saying 'The men of Jabesh-gilead were they that buried Saul'{S}
text_en: The bows of the mighty men are broken, and they that stumbled are girded with strength.
text_pisuk: קֶשֶׁת גִּבֹּרִים, חַתִּים; וְנִכְשָׁלִים, אָזְרוּ חָיִל. | The bows of the mighty men are broken, and they that stumbled are girded with strength. | וַיָּבֹאוּ אַנְשֵׁי יְהוּדָה, וַיִּמְשְׁחוּ-שָׁם אֶת-דָּוִד לְמֶלֶךְ עַל-בֵּית יְהוּדָה; וַיַּגִּדוּ לְדָוִד, לֵאמֹר, אַנְשֵׁי יָבֵישׁ גִּלְעָד, אֲשֶׁר קָבְרוּ אֶת-שָׁאוּל. | And the men of Judah came, and they there anointed David king over the house of Judah. And they told David, saying: 'The men of Jabesh-gilead were they that buried Saul.'{S}

text_he: שבעים בלחם נשכרו ורעבים חדלו עד-עקרה ילדה שבעה ורבת בנים אמלה | They that were full have hired out themselves for bread and they that were hungry have ceased while the barren hath borne seven she that had many children hath languished | וישלח דוד מלאכים אל-אנשי יביש גלעד ויאמר אליהם ברכים אתם ליהוה אשר עשיתם החסד הזה עם-אדניכם עם-שאול ותקברו אתו | And David sent messengers unto the men of Jabesh-gilead and said unto them 'Blessed be ye of the LORD that ye have shown this kindness unto your lord even unto Saul and have buried him
text_en: They that were full have hired out themselves for bread; and they that were hungry have ceased; while the barren hath borne seven, she that had many children hath languished.
text_pisuk: שְׂבֵעִים בַּלֶּחֶם נִשְׂכָּרוּ, וּרְעֵבִים חָדֵלּוּ, עַד-עֲקָרָה יָלְדָה שִׁבְעָה, וְרַבַּת בָּנִים אֻמְלָלָה. | They that were full have hired out themselves for bread; and they that were hungry have ceased; while the barren hath borne seven, she that had many children hath languished. | וַיִּשְׁלַח דָּוִד מַלְאָכִים, אֶל-אַנְשֵׁי יָבֵישׁ גִּלְעָד; וַיֹּאמֶר אֲלֵיהֶם, בְּרֻכִים אַתֶּם לַיהוָה, אֲשֶׁר עֲשִׂיתֶם הַחֶסֶד הַזֶּה עִם-אֲדֹנֵיכֶם עִם-שָׁאוּל, וַתִּקְבְּרוּ אֹתוֹ. | And David sent messengers unto the men of Jabesh-gilead, and said unto them: 'Blessed be ye of the LORD, that ye have shown this kindness unto your lord, even unto Saul, and have buried him.

text_he: יהוה מית ומחיה מוריד שאול ויעל | The LORD killeth and maketh alive He bringeth down to the grave and bringeth up | ועתה יעש-יהוה עמכם חסד ואמת וגם אנכי אעשה אתכם הטובה הזאת אשר עשיתם הדבר הזה | And now the LORD show kindness and truth unto you and I also will requite you this kindness because ye have done this thing
text_en: The LORD killeth, and maketh alive; He bringeth down to the grave, and bringeth up.
text_pisuk: יְהוָה, מֵמִית וּמְחַיֶּה; מוֹרִיד שְׁאוֹל, וַיָּעַל. | The LORD killeth, and maketh alive; He bringeth down to the grave, and bringeth up. | וְעַתָּה, יַעַשׂ-יְהוָה עִמָּכֶם חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת; וְגַם אָנֹכִי, אֶעֱשֶׂה אִתְּכֶם הַטּוֹבָה הַזֹּאת, אֲשֶׁר עֲשִׂיתֶם, הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה. | And now the LORD show kindness and truth unto you; and I also will requite you this kindness, because ye have done this thing.

text_he: יהוה מוריש ומעשיר משפיל אף-מרומם | The LORD maketh poor and maketh rich He bringeth low He also lifteth up | ועתה תחזקנה ידיכם והיו לבני-חיל--כי-מת אדניכם שאול וגם-אתי משחו בית-יהודה למלך--עליהם | Now therefore let your hands be strong and be ye valiant for Saul your lord is dead and also the house of Judah have anointed me king over them'
text_en: The LORD maketh poor, and maketh rich; He bringeth low, He also lifteth up.
text_pisuk: יְהוָה, מוֹרִישׁ וּמַעֲשִׁיר; מַשְׁפִּיל, אַף-מְרוֹמֵם. | The LORD maketh poor, and maketh rich; He bringeth low, He also lifteth up. | וְעַתָּה תֶּחֱזַקְנָה יְדֵיכֶם, וִהְיוּ לִבְנֵי-חַיִל--כִּי-מֵת, אֲדֹנֵיכֶם שָׁאוּל; וְגַם-אֹתִי, מָשְׁחוּ בֵית-יְהוּדָה לְמֶלֶךְ--עֲלֵיהֶם. | Now therefore let your hands be strong, and be ye valiant; for Saul your lord is dead, and also the house of Judah have anointed me king over them.'

text_he: מקים מעפר דל מאשפת ירים אביון להושיב עם-נדיבים וכסא כבוד ינחלם כי ליהוה מצקי ארץ וישת עליהם תבל | He raiseth up the poor out of the dust He lifteth up the needy from the dung-hill to make them sit with princes and inherit the throne of glory for the pillars of the earth are the LORD'S and He hath set the world upon them | ואבנר בן-נר שר-צבא אשר לשאול--לקח את-איש בשת בן-שאול ויעברהו מחנים | Now Abner the son of Ner captain of Saul's host had taken Ish-bosheth the son of Saul and brought him over to Mahanaim
text_en: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, He lifteth up the needy from the dung-hill, to make them sit with princes, and inherit the throne of glory; for the pillars of the earth are the LORD'S, and He hath set the world upon them.
text_pisuk: מֵקִים מֵעָפָר דָּל, מֵאַשְׁפֹּת יָרִים אֶבְיוֹן, לְהוֹשִׁיב עִם-נְדִיבִים, וְכִסֵּא כָבוֹד יַנְחִלֵם: כִּי לַיהוָה מְצֻקֵי אֶרֶץ, וַיָּשֶׁת עֲלֵיהֶם תֵּבֵל. | He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, He lifteth up the needy from the dung-hill, to make them sit with princes, and inherit the throne of glory; for the pillars of the earth are the LORD'S, and He hath set the world upon them. | וְאַבְנֵר בֶּן-נֵר, שַׂר-צָבָא אֲשֶׁר לְשָׁאוּל--לָקַח, אֶת-אִישׁ בֹּשֶׁת בֶּן-שָׁאוּל, וַיַּעֲבִרֵהוּ, מַחֲנָיִם. | Now Abner the son of Ner, captain of Saul's host, had taken Ish-bosheth the son of Saul, and brought him over to Mahanaim;

text_he: רגלי חסידו ישמר ורשעים בחשך ידמו כי-לא בכח יגבר-איש | He will keep the feet of His holy ones but the wicked shall be put to silence in darkness for not by strength shall man prevail | וימלכהו אל-הגלעד ואל-האשורי ואל-יזרעאל ועל-אפרים ועל-בנימן ועל-ישראל כלה | and he made him king over Gilead and over the Ashurites and over Jezreel and over Ephraim and over Benjamin and over all Israel
text_en: He will keep the feet of His holy ones, but the wicked shall be put to silence in darkness; for not by strength shall man prevail.
text_pisuk: רַגְלֵי חֲסִידָו יִשְׁמֹר, וּרְשָׁעִים בַּחֹשֶׁךְ יִדָּמּוּ: כִּי-לֹא בְכֹחַ, יִגְבַּר-אִישׁ. | He will keep the feet of His holy ones, but the wicked shall be put to silence in darkness; for not by strength shall man prevail. | וַיַּמְלִכֵהוּ, אֶל-הַגִּלְעָד, וְאֶל-הָאֲשׁוּרִי, וְאֶל-יִזְרְעֶאל; וְעַל-אֶפְרַיִם, וְעַל-בִּנְיָמִן, וְעַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, כֻּלֹּה. | and he made him king over Gilead, and over the Ashurites, and over Jezreel, and over Ephraim, and over Benjamin, and over all Israel.

text_he: יהוה יחתו מריבו עלו בשמים ירעם--יהוה ידין אפסי-ארץ ויתן-עז למלכו וירם קרן משיחו | They that strive with the LORD shall be broken to pieces against them will He thunder in heaven the LORD will judge the ends of the earth and He will give strength unto His king and exalt the horn of His anointed | בן-ארבעים שנה איש-בשת בן-שאול במלכו על-ישראל ושתים שנים מלך אך בית יהודה היו אחרי דוד | Ish-bosheth Saul's son was forty years old when he began to reign over Israel and he reigned two years But the house of Judah followed David
text_en: They that strive with the LORD shall be broken to pieces; against them will He thunder in heaven; the LORD will judge the ends of the earth; and He will give strength unto His king, and exalt the horn of His anointed.
text_pisuk: יְהוָה יֵחַתּוּ מְרִיבָו, עָלָו בַּשָּׁמַיִם יַרְעֵם--יְהוָה, יָדִין אַפְסֵי-אָרֶץ; וְיִתֶּן-עֹז לְמַלְכּוֹ, וְיָרֵם קֶרֶן מְשִׁיחוֹ. | They that strive with the LORD shall be broken to pieces; against them will He thunder in heaven; the LORD will judge the ends of the earth; and He will give strength unto His king, and exalt the horn of His anointed. | בֶּן-אַרְבָּעִים שָׁנָה אִישׁ-בֹּשֶׁת בֶּן-שָׁאוּל, בְּמָלְכוֹ עַל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וּשְׁתַּיִם שָׁנִים, מָלָךְ; אַךְ בֵּית יְהוּדָה, הָיוּ אַחֲרֵי דָוִד. | Ish-bosheth Saul's son was forty years old when he began to reign over Israel, and he reigned two years. But the house of Judah followed David.

text_he: וילך אלקנה הרמתה על-ביתו והנער היה משרת את-יהוה את-פני עלי הכהן | And Elkanah went to Ramah to his house And the child did minister unto the LORD before Eli the priest | ויהי מספר הימים אשר היה דוד מלך בחברון על-בית יהודה--שבע שנים ושה חדשים | And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months{S}
text_en: And Elkanah went to Ramah to his house. And the child did minister unto the LORD before Eli the priest.
text_pisuk: וַיֵּלֶךְ אֶלְקָנָה הָרָמָתָה, עַל-בֵּיתוֹ; וְהַנַּעַר, הָיָה מְשָׁרֵת אֶת-יְהוָה, אֶת-פְּנֵי, עֵלִי הַכֹּהֵן. | And Elkanah went to Ramah to his house. And the child did minister unto the LORD before Eli the priest. | וַיְהִי מִסְפַּר הַיָּמִים, אֲשֶׁר הָיָה דָוִד מֶלֶךְ בְּחֶבְרוֹן עַל-בֵּית יְהוּדָה--שֶׁבַע שָׁנִים, וְשִׁשָּׁה חֳדָשִׁים. | And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months.{S}

text_he: ובני עלי בני בליעל לא ידעו את-יהוה | Now the sons of Eli were base men they knew not the LORD | ויצא אבנר בן-נר ועבדי איש-בשת בן-שאול מחנים גבעונה | And Abner the son of Ner and the servants of Ish-bosheth the son of Saul went out from Mahanaim to Gibeon
text_en: Now the sons of Eli were base men; they knew not the LORD.
text_pisuk: וּבְנֵי עֵלִי, בְּנֵי בְלִיָּעַל: לֹא יָדְעוּ, אֶת-יְהוָה. | Now the sons of Eli were base men; they knew not the LORD. | וַיֵּצֵא אַבְנֵר בֶּן-נֵר, וְעַבְדֵי אִישׁ-בֹּשֶׁת בֶּן-שָׁאוּל, מִמַּחֲנַיִם, גִּבְעוֹנָה. | And Abner the son of Ner, and the servants of Ish-bosheth the son of Saul, went out from Mahanaim to Gibeon.

text_he: ומשפט הכהנים את-העם--כל-איש זבח זבח ובא נער הכהן כבשל הבשר והמזלג שלש השנים בידו | And the custom of the priests with the people was that when any man offered sacrifice the priest's servant came while the flesh was in seething with a flesh-hook of three teeth in his hand | ויואב בן-צרויה ועבדי דוד יצאו ויפגשום על-ברכת גבעון יחדו וישבו אלה על-הברכה מזה ואלה על-הברכה מזה | And Joab the son of Zeruiah and the servants of David went out and they met together by the pool of Gibeon and sat down the one on the one side of the pool and the other on the other side of the pool
text_en: And the custom of the priests with the people was, that, when any man offered sacrifice, the priest's servant came, while the flesh was in seething, with a flesh-hook of three teeth in his hand;
text_pisuk: וּמִשְׁפַּט הַכֹּהֲנִים, אֶת-הָעָם--כָּל-אִישׁ זֹבֵחַ זֶבַח, וּבָא נַעַר הַכֹּהֵן כְּבַשֵּׁל הַבָּשָׂר, וְהַמַּזְלֵג שְׁלֹשׁ הַשִּׁנַּיִם, בְּיָדוֹ. | And the custom of the priests with the people was, that, when any man offered sacrifice, the priest's servant came, while the flesh was in seething, with a flesh-hook of three teeth in his hand; | וְיוֹאָב בֶּן-צְרוּיָה וְעַבְדֵי דָוִד, יָצְאוּ, וַיִּפְגְּשׁוּם עַל-בְּרֵכַת גִּבְעוֹן, יַחְדָּו; וַיֵּשְׁבוּ אֵלֶּה עַל-הַבְּרֵכָה, מִזֶּה, וְאֵלֶּה עַל-הַבְּרֵכָה, מִזֶּה. | And Joab the son of Zeruiah, and the servants of David, went out; and they met together by the pool of Gibeon, and sat down, the one on the one side of the pool, and the other on the other side of the pool.

text_he: והכה בכיור או בדוד או בקלחת או בפרור--כל אשר יעלה המזלג יקח הכהן בו כה יעשו לכל-ישראל הבאים שם בשלה | and he struck it into the pan or kettle or caldron or pot all that the flesh-hook brought up the priest took therewith So they did unto all the Israelites that came thither in Shiloh | ויאמר אבנר אל-יואב יקומו נא הנערים וישחקו לפנינו ויאמר יואב יקמו | And Abner said to Joab 'Let the young men I pray thee arise and play before us' And Joab said 'Let them arise'
text_en: and he struck it into the pan, or kettle, or caldron, or pot; all that the flesh-hook brought up the priest took therewith. So they did unto all the Israelites that came thither in Shiloh.
text_pisuk: וְהִכָּה בַכִּיּוֹר אוֹ בַדּוּד, אוֹ בַקַּלַּחַת אוֹ בַפָּרוּר--כֹּל אֲשֶׁר יַעֲלֶה הַמַּזְלֵג, יִקַּח הַכֹּהֵן בּוֹ; כָּכָה יַעֲשׂוּ לְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, הַבָּאִים שָׁם בְּשִׁלֹה. | and he struck it into the pan, or kettle, or caldron, or pot; all that the flesh-hook brought up the priest took therewith. So they did unto all the Israelites that came thither in Shiloh. | וַיֹּאמֶר אַבְנֵר, אֶל-יוֹאָב, יָקוּמוּ נָא הַנְּעָרִים, וִישַׂחֲקוּ לְפָנֵינוּ; וַיֹּאמֶר יוֹאָב, יָקֻמוּ. | And Abner said to Joab: 'Let the young men, I pray thee, arise and play before us.' And Joab said: 'Let them arise.'

text_he: גם בטרם יקטרון את-החלב ובא נער הכהן ואמר לאיש הזבח תנה בשר לצלות לכהן ולא-יקח מך בשר מבשל כי אם-חי | Yea before the fat was made to smoke the priest's servant came and said to the man that sacrificed 'Give flesh to roast for the priest for he will not have sodden flesh of thee but raw' | ויקמו ויעברו במספר--שנים עשר לבנימן ולאיש בשת בן-שאול ושנים עשר מעבדי דוד | Then they arose and passed over by number twelve for Benjamin and for Ish-bosheth the son of Saul and twelve of the servants of David
text_en: Yea, before the fat was made to smoke, the priest's servant came, and said to the man that sacrificed: 'Give flesh to roast for the priest; for he will not have sodden flesh of thee, but raw.'
text_pisuk: גַּם, בְּטֶרֶם יַקְטִרוּן אֶת-הַחֵלֶב, וּבָא נַעַר הַכֹּהֵן וְאָמַר לָאִישׁ הַזֹּבֵחַ, תְּנָה בָשָׂר לִצְלוֹת לַכֹּהֵן; וְלֹא-יִקַּח מִמְּךָ בָּשָׂר מְבֻשָּׁל, כִּי אִם-חָי. | Yea, before the fat was made to smoke, the priest's servant came, and said to the man that sacrificed: 'Give flesh to roast for the priest; for he will not have sodden flesh of thee, but raw.' | וַיָּקֻמוּ, וַיַּעַבְרוּ בְמִסְפָּר--שְׁנֵים עָשָׂר לְבִנְיָמִן, וּלְאִישׁ בֹּשֶׁת בֶּן-שָׁאוּל, וּשְׁנֵים עָשָׂר, מֵעַבְדֵי דָוִד. | Then they arose and passed over by number: twelve for Benjamin, and for Ish-bosheth the son of Saul, and twelve of the servants of David.

text_he: ויאמר אליו האיש קטר יקטירון כיום החלב וקח-לך כאשר תאוה נפשך ואמר לו (לא) כי עתה תן--ואם-לא לקחתי בחזקה | And if the man said unto him 'Let the fat be made to smoke first of all and then take as much as thy soul desireth' then he would say 'Nay but thou shalt give it me now and if not I will take it by force' | ויחזקו איש בראש רעהו וחרבו בצד רעהו ויפלו יחדו ויקרא למקום הוא חלקת הצרים אשר בגבעון | And they caught every one his fellow by the head and thrust his sword in his fellow's side so they fell down together wherefore that place was called Helkath-hazzurim which is in Gibeon
text_en: And if the man said unto him: 'Let the fat be made to smoke first of all, and then take as much as thy soul desireth'; then he would say: 'Nay, but thou shalt give it me now; and if not, I will take it by force.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו הָאִישׁ, קַטֵּר יַקְטִירוּן כַּיּוֹם הַחֵלֶב, וְקַח-לְךָ, כַּאֲשֶׁר תְּאַוֶּה נַפְשֶׁךָ; וְאָמַר לו (לֹא), כִּי עַתָּה תִתֵּן--וְאִם-לֹא, לָקַחְתִּי בְחָזְקָה. | And if the man said unto him: 'Let the fat be made to smoke first of all, and then take as much as thy soul desireth'; then he would say: 'Nay, but thou shalt give it me now; and if not, I will take it by force.' | וַיַּחֲזִקוּ אִישׁ בְּרֹאשׁ רֵעֵהוּ, וְחַרְבּוֹ בְּצַד רֵעֵהוּ, וַיִּפְּלוּ, יַחְדָּו; וַיִּקְרָא לַמָּקוֹם הַהוּא, חֶלְקַת הַצֻּרִים אֲשֶׁר בְּגִבְעוֹן. | And they caught every one his fellow by the head, and thrust his sword in his fellow's side; so they fell down together; wherefore that place was called Helkath-hazzurim, which is in Gibeon.

text_he: ותהי חטאת הנערים גדולה מאד את-פני יהוה כי נאצו האנשים את מנחת יהוה | And the sin of the young men was very great before the LORD for the men dealt contemptuously with the offering of the LORD | ותהי המלחמה קשה עד-מאד ביום הוא וינגף אבנר ואנשי ישראל לפני עבדי דוד | And the battle was very sore that day and Abner was beaten and the men of Israel before the servants of David
text_en: And the sin of the young men was very great before the LORD; for the men dealt contemptuously with the offering of the LORD.
text_pisuk: וַתְּהִי חַטַּאת הַנְּעָרִים גְּדוֹלָה מְאֹד, אֶת-פְּנֵי יְהוָה: כִּי נִאֲצוּ הָאֲנָשִׁים, אֵת מִנְחַת יְהוָה. | And the sin of the young men was very great before the LORD; for the men dealt contemptuously with the offering of the LORD. | וַתְּהִי הַמִּלְחָמָה קָשָׁה עַד-מְאֹד, בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא; וַיִּנָּגֶף אַבְנֵר וְאַנְשֵׁי יִשְׂרָאֵל, לִפְנֵי עַבְדֵי דָוִד. | And the battle was very sore that day; and Abner was beaten, and the men of Israel, before the servants of David.

text_he: ושמואל משרת את-פני יהוה נער חגור אפוד בד | But Samuel ministered before the LORD being a child girded with a linen ephod | ויהיו-שם שלשה בני צרויה--יואב ואבישי ועשהאל ועשהאל קל ברגליו כאחד הצבים אשר בשדה | And the three sons of Zeruiah were there Joab and Abishai and Asahel and Asahel was as light of foot as one of the roes that are in the field
text_en: But Samuel ministered before the LORD, being a child, girded with a linen ephod.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁמוּאֵל, מְשָׁרֵת אֶת-פְּנֵי יְהוָה: נַעַר, חָגוּר אֵפוֹד בָּד. | But Samuel ministered before the LORD, being a child, girded with a linen ephod. | וַיִּהְיוּ-שָׁם, שְׁלֹשָׁה בְּנֵי צְרוּיָה--יוֹאָב וַאֲבִישַׁי, וַעֲשָׂהאֵל; וַעֲשָׂהאֵל קַל בְּרַגְלָיו, כְּאַחַד הַצְּבָיִם אֲשֶׁר בַּשָּׂדֶה. | And the three sons of Zeruiah were there, Joab, and Abishai, and Asahel; and Asahel was as light of foot as one of the roes that are in the field.

text_he: ומעיל קטן תעשה-לו אמו והעלתה לו מימים ימימה--בעלותה את-אישה לזבח את-זבח הימים | Moreover his mother made him a little robe and brought it to him from year to year when she came up with her husband to offer the yearly sacrifice | וירדף עשהאל אחרי אבנר ולא-נטה לכת על-הימין ועל-השמאול מאחרי אבנר | And Asahel pursued after Abner and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner
text_en: Moreover his mother made him a little robe, and brought it to him from year to year, when she came up with her husband to offer the yearly sacrifice.
text_pisuk: וּמְעִיל קָטֹן תַּעֲשֶׂה-לּוֹ אִמּוֹ, וְהַעַלְתָה לוֹ מִיָּמִים יָמִימָה--בַּעֲלוֹתָהּ, אֶת-אִישָׁהּ, לִזְבֹּחַ, אֶת-זֶבַח הַיָּמִים. | Moreover his mother made him a little robe, and brought it to him from year to year, when she came up with her husband to offer the yearly sacrifice. | וַיִּרְדֹּף עֲשָׂהאֵל, אַחֲרֵי אַבְנֵר; וְלֹא-נָטָה לָלֶכֶת, עַל-הַיָּמִין וְעַל-הַשְּׂמֹאול, מֵאַחֲרֵי, אַבְנֵר. | And Asahel pursued after Abner; and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner.

text_he: וברך עלי את-אלקנה ואת-אשתו ואמר ישם יהוה לך זרע מן-האשה הזאת תחת השאלה אשר שאל ליהוה והלכו למקומו | And Eli would bless Elkanah and his wife and say 'The LORD give thee seed of this woman for the loan which was lent to the LORD' And they would go unto their own home | ויפן אבנר אחריו ויאמר האתה זה עשהאל ויאמר אנכי | Then Abner looked behind him and said 'Is it thou Asahel' And he answered 'It is I'
text_en: And Eli would bless Elkanah and his wife, and say: 'The LORD give thee seed of this woman for the loan which was lent to the LORD.' And they would go unto their own home.
text_pisuk: וּבֵרַךְ עֵלִי אֶת-אֶלְקָנָה וְאֶת-אִשְׁתּוֹ, וְאָמַר יָשֵׂם יְהוָה לְךָ זֶרַע מִן-הָאִשָּׁה הַזֹּאת, תַּחַת הַשְּׁאֵלָה, אֲשֶׁר שָׁאַל לַיהוָה; וְהָלְכוּ, לִמְקוֹמוֹ. | And Eli would bless Elkanah and his wife, and say: 'The LORD give thee seed of this woman for the loan which was lent to the LORD.' And they would go unto their own home. | וַיִּפֶן אַבְנֵר, אַחֲרָיו, וַיֹּאמֶר, הַאַתָּה זֶה עֲשָׂהאֵל; וַיֹּאמֶר, אָנֹכִי. | Then Abner looked behind him, and said: 'Is it thou, Asahel?' And he answered: 'It is I.'

text_he: כי-פקד יהוה את-חנה ותהר ותלד שלשה-בנים ושתי בנות ויגדל הנער שמואל עם-יהוה | So the LORD remembered Hannah and she conceived and bore three sons and two daughters And the child Samuel grew before the LORD{S} | ויאמר לו אבנר נטה לך על-ימינך או על-שמאלך ואחז לך אחד מהנערים וקח-לך את-חלצתו ולא-אבה עשהאל לסור מאחריו | And Abner said to him 'Turn thee aside to thy right hand or to thy left and lay thee hold on one of the young men and take thee his armour' But Asahel would not turn aside from following him
text_en: So the LORD remembered Hannah, and she conceived, and bore three sons and two daughters. And the child Samuel grew before the LORD.{S}
text_pisuk: כִּי-פָקַד יְהוָה אֶת-חַנָּה, וַתַּהַר וַתֵּלֶד שְׁלֹשָׁה-בָנִים וּשְׁתֵּי בָנוֹת; וַיִּגְדַּל הַנַּעַר שְׁמוּאֵל, עִם-יְהוָה. | So the LORD remembered Hannah, and she conceived, and bore three sons and two daughters. And the child Samuel grew before the LORD.{S} | וַיֹּאמֶר לוֹ אַבְנֵר, נְטֵה לְךָ עַל-יְמִינְךָ אוֹ עַל-שְׂמֹאלֶךָ, וֶאֱחֹז לְךָ אֶחָד מֵהַנְּעָרִים, וְקַח-לְךָ אֶת-חֲלִצָתוֹ; וְלֹא-אָבָה עֲשָׂהאֵל, לָסוּר מֵאַחֲרָיו. | And Abner said to him: 'Turn thee aside to thy right hand or to thy left, and lay thee hold on one of the young men, and take thee his armour.' But Asahel would not turn aside from following him.

text_he: ועלי זקן מאד ושמע את כל-אשר יעשון בניו לכל-ישראל ואת אשר-ישכבון את-הנשים הצבאות פתח אהל מועד | Now Eli was very old and he heard all that his sons did unto all Israel and how that they lay with the women that did service at the door of the tent of meeting | ויסף עוד אבנר לאמר אל-עשהאל סור לך מאחרי למה אכה ארצה ואיך אשא פני אל-יואב אחיך | And Abner said again to Asahel 'Turn thee aside from following me wherefore should I smite thee to the ground how then should I hold up my face to Joab thy brother'
text_en: Now Eli was very old; and he heard all that his sons did unto all Israel, and how that they lay with the women that did service at the door of the tent of meeting.
text_pisuk: וְעֵלִי, זָקֵן מְאֹד; וְשָׁמַע, אֵת כָּל-אֲשֶׁר יַעֲשׂוּן בָּנָיו לְכָל-יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְאֵת אֲשֶׁר-יִשְׁכְּבוּן אֶת-הַנָּשִׁים, הַצֹּבְאוֹת פֶּתַח אֹהֶל מוֹעֵד. | Now Eli was very old; and he heard all that his sons did unto all Israel, and how that they lay with the women that did service at the door of the tent of meeting. | וַיֹּסֶף עוֹד אַבְנֵר, לֵאמֹר אֶל-עֲשָׂהאֵל, סוּר לְךָ, מֵאַחֲרָי: לָמָּה אַכֶּכָּה, אַרְצָה, וְאֵיךְ אֶשָּׂא פָנַי, אֶל-יוֹאָב אָחִיךָ. | And Abner said again to Asahel: 'Turn thee aside from following me; wherefore should I smite thee to the ground? how then should I hold up my face to Joab thy brother?'

text_he: ויאמר להם למה תעשון כדברים האלה אשר אנכי שמע את-דבריכם רעים מאת כל-העם אלה | And he said unto them 'Why do ye such things for I hear evil reports concerning you from all this people | וימאן לסור ויכהו אבנר באחרי החנית אל-החמש ותצא החנית מאחריו ויפל-שם וימת תחתו ויהי כל-הבא אל-המקום אשר-נפל שם עשהאל וימת--ויעמדו | Howbeit he refused to turn aside wherefore Abner with the hinder end of the spear smote him in the groin that the spear came out behind him and he fell down there and died in the same place and it came to pass that as many as came to the place where Asahel fell down and died stood still
text_en: And he said unto them: 'Why do ye such things? for I hear evil reports concerning you from all this people.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּאמֶר לָהֶם, לָמָּה תַעֲשׂוּן כַּדְּבָרִים הָאֵלֶּה, אֲשֶׁר אָנֹכִי שֹׁמֵעַ אֶת-דִּבְרֵיכֶם רָעִים, מֵאֵת כָּל-הָעָם אֵלֶּה. | And he said unto them: 'Why do ye such things? for I hear evil reports concerning you from all this people. | וַיְמָאֵן לָסוּר, וַיַּכֵּהוּ אַבְנֵר בְּאַחֲרֵי הַחֲנִית אֶל-הַחֹמֶשׁ וַתֵּצֵא הַחֲנִית מֵאַחֲרָיו, וַיִּפָּל-שָׁם, וַיָּמָת תַּחְתָּו; וַיְהִי כָּל-הַבָּא אֶל-הַמָּקוֹם אֲשֶׁר-נָפַל שָׁם עֲשָׂהאֵל, וַיָּמֹת--וַיַּעֲמֹדוּ. | Howbeit he refused to turn aside; wherefore Abner with the hinder end of the spear smote him in the groin, that the spear came out behind him; and he fell down there, and died in the same place; and it came to pass, that as many as came to the place where Asahel fell down and died stood still.

text_he: אל בני כי לוא-טובה השמעה אשר אנכי שמע מעברים עם-יהוה | Nay my sons for it is no good report which I hear the LORD'S people do spread abroad | וירדפו יואב ואבישי אחרי אבנר והשמש באה--והמה באו עד-גבעת אמה אשר על-פני-גיח דרך מדבר גבעון | But Joab and Abishai pursued after Abner and the sun went down when they were come to the hill of Ammah that lieth before Giah by the way of the wilderness of Gibeon
text_en: Nay, my sons; for it is no good report which I hear the LORD'S people do spread abroad.
text_pisuk: אַל, בָּנָי: כִּי לוֹא-טוֹבָה הַשְּׁמֻעָה אֲשֶׁר אָנֹכִי שֹׁמֵעַ, מַעֲבִרִים עַם-יְהוָה. | Nay, my sons; for it is no good report which I hear the LORD'S people do spread abroad. | וַיִּרְדְּפוּ יוֹאָב וַאֲבִישַׁי, אַחֲרֵי אַבְנֵר; וְהַשֶּׁמֶשׁ בָּאָה--וְהֵמָּה בָּאוּ עַד-גִּבְעַת אַמָּה, אֲשֶׁר עַל-פְּנֵי-גִיחַ דֶּרֶךְ מִדְבַּר גִּבְעוֹן. | But Joab and Abishai pursued after Abner; and the sun went down when they were come to the hill of Ammah, that lieth before Giah by the way of the wilderness of Gibeon.

text_he: אם-יחטא איש לאיש ופלו אלהים ואם ליהוה יחטא-איש מי יתפל-לו ולא ישמעו לקול אביהם כי-חפץ יהוה להמיתם | If one man sin against another God shall judge him but if a man sin against the LORD who shall entreat for him' But they hearkened not unto the voice of their father because the LORD would slay them | ויתקבצו בני-בנימן אחרי אבנר ויהיו לאגדה אחת ויעמדו על ראש-גבעה אחת | And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner and became one band and stood on the top of a hill
text_en: If one man sin against another, God shall judge him; but if a man sin against the LORD, who shall entreat for him?' But they hearkened not unto the voice of their father, because the LORD would slay them.
text_pisuk: אִם-יֶחֱטָא אִישׁ לְאִישׁ, וּפִלְלוֹ אֱלֹהִים, וְאִם לַיהוָה יֶחֱטָא-אִישׁ, מִי יִתְפַּלֶּל-לוֹ; וְלֹא יִשְׁמְעוּ לְקוֹל אֲבִיהֶם, כִּי-חָפֵץ יְהוָה לַהֲמִיתָם. | If one man sin against another, God shall judge him; but if a man sin against the LORD, who shall entreat for him?' But they hearkened not unto the voice of their father, because the LORD would slay them. | וַיִּתְקַבְּצוּ בְנֵי-בִנְיָמִן אַחֲרֵי אַבְנֵר, וַיִּהְיוּ לַאֲגֻדָּה אֶחָת; וַיַּעַמְדוּ, עַל רֹאשׁ-גִּבְעָה אֶחָת. | And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner, and became one band, and stood on the top of a hill.

text_he: והנער שמואל הלך וגדל וטוב גם עם-יהוה וגם עם-אנשים | And the child Samuel grew on and increased in favour both with the LORD and also with men | ויקרא אבנר אל-יואב ויאמר הלנצח תאכל חרב--הלוא ידעתה כי-מרה תהיה באחרונה ועד-מתי לא-תאמר לעם לשוב מאחרי אחיהם | Then Abner called to Joab and said 'Shall the sword devour for ever knowest thou not that it will be bitterness in the end how long shall it be then ere thou bid the people return from following their brethren'
text_en: And the child Samuel grew on, and increased in favour both with the LORD, and also with men.
text_pisuk: וְהַנַּעַר שְׁמוּאֵל, הֹלֵךְ וְגָדֵל וָטוֹב: גַּם, עִם-יְהוָה, וְגַם, עִם-אֲנָשִׁים. | And the child Samuel grew on, and increased in favour both with the LORD, and also with men. | וַיִּקְרָא אַבְנֵר אֶל-יוֹאָב, וַיֹּאמֶר הֲלָנֶצַח תֹּאכַל חֶרֶב--הֲלוֹא יָדַעְתָּה, כִּי-מָרָה תִהְיֶה בָּאַחֲרוֹנָה; וְעַד-מָתַי לֹא-תֹאמַר לָעָם, לָשׁוּב מֵאַחֲרֵי אֲחֵיהֶם. | Then Abner called to Joab, and said: 'Shall the sword devour for ever? knowest thou not that it will be bitterness in the end? how long shall it be then, ere thou bid the people return from following their brethren?'

text_he: ויבא איש-אלהים אל-עלי ויאמר אליו כה אמר יהוה הנגלה נגליתי אל-בית אביך בהיותם במצרים לבית פרעה | And there came a man of God unto Eli and said unto him 'Thus saith the LORD Did I reveal Myself unto the house of thy father when they were in Egypt in bondage to Pharaoh's house | ויאמר יואב--חי האלהים כי לולא דברת כי אז מהבקר נעלה העם איש מאחרי אחיו | And Joab said 'As God liveth if thou hadst not spoken surely then only after the morning the people had gone away every one from following his brother'
text_en: And there came a man of God unto Eli, and said unto him: 'Thus saith the LORD: Did I reveal Myself unto the house of thy father, when they were in Egypt in bondage to Pharaoh's house?
text_pisuk: וַיָּבֹא אִישׁ-אֱלֹהִים, אֶל-עֵלִי; וַיֹּאמֶר אֵלָיו, כֹּה אָמַר יְהוָה, הֲנִגְלֹה נִגְלֵיתִי אֶל-בֵּית אָבִיךָ, בִּהְיוֹתָם בְּמִצְרַיִם לְבֵית פַּרְעֹה. | And there came a man of God unto Eli, and said unto him: 'Thus saith the LORD: Did I reveal Myself unto the house of thy father, when they were in Egypt in bondage to Pharaoh's house? | וַיֹּאמֶר יוֹאָב--חַי הָאֱלֹהִים, כִּי לוּלֵא דִּבַּרְתָּ: כִּי אָז מֵהַבֹּקֶר נַעֲלָה הָעָם, אִישׁ מֵאַחֲרֵי אָחִיו. | And Joab said: 'As God liveth, if thou hadst not spoken, surely then only after the morning the people had gone away, every one from following his brother.'

text_he: ובחר אתו מכל-שבטי ישראל לי לכהן לעלות על-מזבחי להקטיר קטרת לשאת אפוד לפני ואתנה לבית אביך את-כל-אשי בני ישראל | And did I choose him out of all the tribes of Israel to be My priest to go up unto Mine altar to burn incense to wear an ephod before Me and did I give unto the house of thy father all the offerings of the children of Israel made by fire | ויתקע יואב בשופר ויעמדו כל-העם ולא-ירדפו עוד אחרי ישראל ולא-יספו עוד להלחם | So Joab blew the horn and all the people stood still and pursued after Israel no more neither fought they any more
text_en: And did I choose him out of all the tribes of Israel to be My priest, to go up unto Mine altar, to burn incense, to wear an ephod before Me? and did I give unto the house of thy father all the offerings of the children of Israel made by fire?
text_pisuk: וּבָחֹר אֹתוֹ מִכָּל-שִׁבְטֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לִי, לְכֹהֵן, לַעֲלוֹת עַל-מִזְבְּחִי לְהַקְטִיר קְטֹרֶת לָשֵׂאת אֵפוֹד, לְפָנָי; וָאֶתְּנָה לְבֵית אָבִיךָ, אֶת-כָּל-אִשֵּׁי בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל. | And did I choose him out of all the tribes of Israel to be My priest, to go up unto Mine altar, to burn incense, to wear an ephod before Me? and did I give unto the house of thy father all the offerings of the children of Israel made by fire? | וַיִּתְקַע יוֹאָב, בַּשּׁוֹפָר, וַיַּעַמְדוּ כָּל-הָעָם, וְלֹא-יִרְדְּפוּ עוֹד אַחֲרֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל; וְלֹא-יָסְפוּ עוֹד, לְהִלָּחֵם. | So Joab blew the horn, and all the people stood still, and pursued after Israel no more, neither fought they any more.

text_he: למה תבעטו בזבחי ובמנחתי אשר צויתי מעון ותכבד את-בניך מני להבריאכם מראשית כל-מנחת ישראל לעמי | Wherefore kick ye at My sacrifice and at Mine offering which I have commanded in My habitation and honourest thy sons above Me to make yourselves fat with the chiefest of all the offerings of Israel My people | ואבנר ואנשיו הלכו בערבה כל הלילה הוא ויעברו את-הירדן וילכו כל-הבתרון ויבאו מחנים | And Abner and his men went all that night through the Arabah and they passed over the Jordan and went through all Bithron and came to Mahanaim
text_en: Wherefore kick ye at My sacrifice and at Mine offering, which I have commanded in My habitation; and honourest thy sons above Me, to make yourselves fat with the chiefest of all the offerings of Israel My people?
text_pisuk: לָמָּה תִבְעֲטוּ, בְּזִבְחִי וּבְמִנְחָתִי, אֲשֶׁר צִוִּיתִי, מָעוֹן; וַתְּכַבֵּד אֶת-בָּנֶיךָ, מִמֶּנִּי, לְהַבְרִיאֲכֶם מֵרֵאשִׁית כָּל-מִנְחַת יִשְׂרָאֵל, לְעַמִּי. | Wherefore kick ye at My sacrifice and at Mine offering, which I have commanded in My habitation; and honourest thy sons above Me, to make yourselves fat with the chiefest of all the offerings of Israel My people? | וְאַבְנֵר וַאֲנָשָׁיו, הָלְכוּ בָּעֲרָבָה, כֹּל, הַלַּיְלָה הַהוּא; וַיַּעַבְרוּ אֶת-הַיַּרְדֵּן, וַיֵּלְכוּ כָּל-הַבִּתְרוֹן, וַיָּבֹאוּ, מַחֲנָיִם. | And Abner and his men went all that night through the Arabah; and they passed over the Jordan, and went through all Bithron, and came to Mahanaim.

text_he: לכן נאם-יהוה אלהי ישראל אמור אמרתי ביתך ובית אביך יתהלכו לפני עד-עולם ועתה נאם-יהוה חלילה לי כי-מכבדי אכבד ובזי יקלו | Therefore the LORD the God of Israel saith I said indeed that thy house and the house of thy father should walk before Me for ever but now the LORD saith Be it far from Me for them that honour Me I will honour and they that despise Me shall be lightly esteemed | ויואב שב מאחרי אבנר ויקבץ את-כל-העם ויפקדו מעבדי דוד תשעה-עשר איש--ועשהאל | And Joab returned from following Abner and when he had gathered all the people together there lacked of David's servants nineteen men and Asahel
text_en: Therefore the LORD, the God of Israel, saith: I said indeed that thy house, and the house of thy father, should walk before Me for ever; but now the LORD saith: Be it far from Me: for them that honour Me I will honour, and they that despise Me shall be lightly esteemed.
text_pisuk: לָכֵן, נְאֻם-יְהוָה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, אָמוֹר אָמַרְתִּי, בֵּיתְךָ וּבֵית אָבִיךָ יִתְהַלְּכוּ לְפָנַי עַד-עוֹלָם; וְעַתָּה נְאֻם-יְהוָה חָלִילָה לִּי, כִּי-מְכַבְּדַי אֲכַבֵּד וּבֹזַי יֵקָלּוּ. | Therefore the LORD, the God of Israel, saith: I said indeed that thy house, and the house of thy father, should walk before Me for ever; but now the LORD saith: Be it far from Me: for them that honour Me I will honour, and they that despise Me shall be lightly esteemed. | וְיוֹאָב, שָׁב מֵאַחֲרֵי אַבְנֵר, וַיִּקְבֹּץ, אֶת-כָּל-הָעָם; וַיִּפָּקְדוּ מֵעַבְדֵי דָוִד, תִּשְׁעָה-עָשָׂר אִישׁ--וַעֲשָׂהאֵל. | And Joab returned from following Abner; and when he had gathered all the people together, there lacked of David's servants nineteen men and Asahel.

text_he: הנה ימים באים וגדעתי את-זרעך ואת-זרע בית אביך--מהיות זקן ביתך | Behold the days come that I will cut off thine arm and the arm of thy father's house that there shall not be an old man in thy house | ועבדי דוד הכו מבנימן ובאנשי אבנר שלש-מאות ושים איש מתו | But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin even of Abner's men--three hundred and threescore men died
text_en: Behold, the days come, that I will cut off thine arm, and the arm of thy father's house, that there shall not be an old man in thy house.
text_pisuk: הִנֵּה, יָמִים בָּאִים, וְגָדַעְתִּי אֶת-זְרֹעֲךָ, וְאֶת-זְרֹעַ בֵּית אָבִיךָ--מִהְיוֹת זָקֵן, בְּבֵיתֶךָ. | Behold, the days come, that I will cut off thine arm, and the arm of thy father's house, that there shall not be an old man in thy house. | וְעַבְדֵי דָוִד, הִכּוּ מִבִּנְיָמִן, וּבְאַנְשֵׁי, אַבְנֵר: שְׁלֹשׁ-מֵאוֹת וְשִׁשִּׁים אִישׁ, מֵתוּ. | But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin, even of Abner's men--three hundred and threescore men died.

text_he: והבטת צר מעון בכל אשר-יטיב את-ישראל ולא-יהיה זקן ביתך כל-הימים | And thou shalt behold a rival in My habitation in all the good which shall be done to Israel and there shall not be an old man in thy house for ever | וישאו את-עשהאל ויקברהו בקבר אביו אשר בית לחם וילכו כל-הלילה יואב ואנשיו ויאר להם בחברון | And they took up Asahel and buried him in the sepulchre of his father which was in Beth-lehem And Joab and his men went all night and the day broke upon them at Hebron
text_en: And thou shalt behold a rival in My habitation, in all the good which shall be done to Israel; and there shall not be an old man in thy house for ever.
text_pisuk: וְהִבַּטְתָּ צַר מָעוֹן, בְּכֹל אֲשֶׁר-יֵיטִיב אֶת-יִשְׂרָאֵל; וְלֹא-יִהְיֶה זָקֵן בְּבֵיתְךָ, כָּל-הַיָּמִים. | And thou shalt behold a rival in My habitation, in all the good which shall be done to Israel; and there shall not be an old man in thy house for ever. | וַיִּשְׂאוּ, אֶת-עֲשָׂהאֵל, וַיִּקְבְּרֻהוּ בְּקֶבֶר אָבִיו, אֲשֶׁר בֵּית לָחֶם; וַיֵּלְכוּ כָל-הַלַּיְלָה, יוֹאָב וַאֲנָשָׁיו, וַיֵּאֹר לָהֶם, בְּחֶבְרוֹן. | And they took up Asahel, and buried him in the sepulchre of his father, which was in Beth-lehem. And Joab and his men went all night, and the day broke upon them at Hebron.

text_he: ואיש לא-אכרית לך מעם מזבחי לכלות את-עיניך ולאדיב את-נפשך וכל-מרבית ביתך ימותו אנשים
text_en: Yet will I not cut off every man of thine from Mine altar, to make thine eyes to fail, and thy heart to languish; and all the increase of thy house shall die young men.
text_pisuk: וְאִישׁ, לֹא-אַכְרִית לְךָ מֵעִם מִזְבְּחִי, לְכַלּוֹת אֶת-עֵינֶיךָ, וְלַאֲדִיב אֶת-נַפְשֶׁךָ; וְכָל-מַרְבִּית בֵּיתְךָ, יָמוּתוּ אֲנָשִׁים.

text_he: וזה-לך האות אשר יבא אל-שני בניך--אל-חפני ופינחס ביום אחד ימותו שניהם
text_en: And this shall be the sign unto thee, that which shall come upon thy two sons, on Hophni and Phinehas: in one day they shall die both of them.
text_pisuk: וְזֶה-לְּךָ הָאוֹת, אֲשֶׁר יָבֹא אֶל-שְׁנֵי בָנֶיךָ--אֶל-חָפְנִי, וּפִינְחָס: בְּיוֹם אֶחָד, יָמוּתוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם.

text_he: והקימתי לי כהן נאמן כאשר בלבי ובנפשי יעשה ובניתי לו בית נאמן והתהלך לפני-משיחי כל-הימים
text_en: And I will raise Me up a faithful priest, that shall do according to that which is in My heart and in My mind; and I will build him a sure house; and he shall walk before Mine anointed for ever.
text_pisuk: וַהֲקִימֹתִי לִי כֹּהֵן נֶאֱמָן, כַּאֲשֶׁר בִּלְבָבִי וּבְנַפְשִׁי יַעֲשֶׂה; וּבָנִיתִי לוֹ בַּיִת נֶאֱמָן, וְהִתְהַלֵּךְ לִפְנֵי-מְשִׁיחִי כָּל-הַיָּמִים.

text_he: והיה כל-הנותר ביתך יבוא להשתחות לו לאגורת כסף וכר-לחם ואמר ספחני נא אל-אחת הכהנות--לאכל פת-לחם
text_en: And it shall come to pass, that every one that is left in thy house shall come and bow down to him for a piece of silver and a loaf of bread, and shall say: Put me, I pray thee, into one of the priests' offices, that I may eat a morsel of bread.'
text_pisuk: וְהָיָה, כָּל-הַנּוֹתָר בְּבֵיתְךָ, יָבוֹא לְהִשְׁתַּחֲות לוֹ, לַאֲגוֹרַת כֶּסֶף וְכִכַּר-לָחֶם; וְאָמַר, סְפָחֵנִי נָא אֶל-אַחַת הַכְּהֻנּוֹת--לֶאֱכֹל פַּת-לָחֶם.

text_he: והנער שמואל משרת את-יהוה לפני עלי ודבר-יהוה היה יקר בימים הם--אין חזון נפרץ | And the child Samuel ministered unto the LORD before Eli And the word of the LORD was precious in those days there was no frequent vision{S} | ותהי המלחמה ארכה בין בית שאול ובין בית דוד ודוד הלך וחזק ובית שאול הלכים ודלים | Now there was long war between the house of Saul and the house of David and David waxed stronger and stronger but the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker{S}
text_en: And the child Samuel ministered unto the LORD before Eli. And the word of the LORD was precious in those days; there was no frequent vision.{S}
text_pisuk: וְהַנַּעַר שְׁמוּאֵל מְשָׁרֵת אֶת-יְהוָה, לִפְנֵי עֵלִי; וּדְבַר-יְהוָה, הָיָה יָקָר בַּיָּמִים הָהֵם--אֵין חָזוֹן, נִפְרָץ. | And the child Samuel ministered unto the LORD before Eli. And the word of the LORD was precious in those days; there was no frequent vision.{S} | וַתְּהִי הַמִּלְחָמָה, אֲרֻכָּה, בֵּין בֵּית שָׁאוּל, וּבֵין בֵּית דָּוִד; וְדָוִד הֹלֵךְ וְחָזֵק, וּבֵית שָׁאוּל הֹלְכִים וְדַלִּים. | Now there was long war between the house of Saul and the house of David; and David waxed stronger and stronger, but the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker.{S}

text_he: ויהי ביום הוא ועלי שכב במקומו ועינו החלו כהות לא יוכל לראות | And it came to pass at that time when Eli was laid down in his place--now his eyes had begun to wax dim that he could not see-- | וילדו (ויולדו) לדוד בנים בחברון ויהי בכורו אמנון לאחינעם היזרעאלת | And unto David were sons born in Hebron and his first-born was Amnon of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess
text_en: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place--now his eyes had begun to wax dim, that he could not see--
text_pisuk: וַיְהִי בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא, וְעֵלִי שֹׁכֵב בִּמְקוֹמוֹ; וְעֵינָו הֵחֵלּוּ כֵהוֹת, לֹא יוּכַל לִרְאוֹת. | And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place--now his eyes had begun to wax dim, that he could not see-- | וילדו (וַיִּוָּלְדוּ) לְדָוִד בָּנִים, בְּחֶבְרוֹן; וַיְהִי בְכוֹרוֹ אַמְנוֹן, לַאֲחִינֹעַם הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִת. | And unto David were sons born in Hebron; and his first-born was Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess;

text_he: ונר אלהים טרם יכבה ושמואל שכב בהיכל יהוה אשר-שם ארון אלהים | and the lamp of God was not yet gone out and Samuel was laid down to sleep in the temple of the LORD where the ark of God was | ומשנהו כלאב לאביגל (לאביגיל) אשת נבל הכרמלי והשלשי אבשלום בן-מעכה בת-תלמי מלך גשור | and his second Chileab of Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite and the third Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur
text_en: and the lamp of God was not yet gone out, and Samuel was laid down to sleep in the temple of the LORD, where the ark of God was,
text_pisuk: וְנֵר אֱלֹהִים טֶרֶם יִכְבֶּה, וּשְׁמוּאֵל שֹׁכֵב, בְּהֵיכַל יְהוָה, אֲשֶׁר-שָׁם אֲרוֹן אֱלֹהִים. | and the lamp of God was not yet gone out, and Samuel was laid down to sleep in the temple of the LORD, where the ark of God was, | וּמִשְׁנֵהוּ כִלְאָב, לאביגל (לַאֲבִיגַיִל) אֵשֶׁת נָבָל הַכַּרְמְלִי; וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁי אַבְשָׁלוֹם בֶּן-מַעֲכָה, בַּת-תַּלְמַי מֶלֶךְ גְּשׁוּר. | and his second, Chileab, of Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite; and the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur;

text_he: ויקרא יהוה אל-שמואל ויאמר הני | that the LORD called Samuel and he said 'Here am I' | והרביעי אדניה בן-חגית והחמישי שפטיה בן-אביטל | and the fourth Adonijah the son of Haggith and the fifth Shephatiah the son of Abital
text_en: that the LORD called Samuel; and he said: 'Here am I.'
text_pisuk: וַיִּקְרָא יְהוָה אֶל-שְׁמוּאֵל, וַיֹּאמֶר הִנֵּנִי. | that the LORD called Samuel; and he said: 'Here am I.' | וְהָרְבִיעִי, אֲדֹנִיָּה בֶן-חַגִּית; וְהַחֲמִישִׁי, שְׁפַטְיָה בֶן-אֲבִיטָל. | and the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;

text_he: וירץ אל-עלי ויאמר הני כי-קראת לי ויאמר לא-קראתי שוב שכב וילך וישכב | And he ran unto Eli and said 'Here am I for thou didst call me' And he said 'I called not lie down again' And he went and lay down{S} | והשי יתרעם לעגלה אשת דוד אלה ילדו לדוד בחברון | and the sixth Ithream of Eglah David's wife These were born to David in Hebron
text_en: And he ran unto Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And he said: 'I called not; lie down again.' And he went and lay down.{S}
text_pisuk: וַיָּרָץ אֶל-עֵלִי, וַיֹּאמֶר הִנְנִי כִּי-קָרָאתָ לִּי, וַיֹּאמֶר לֹא-קָרָאתִי, שׁוּב שְׁכָב; וַיֵּלֶךְ, וַיִּשְׁכָּב. | And he ran unto Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And he said: 'I called not; lie down again.' And he went and lay down.{S} | וְהַשִּׁשִּׁי יִתְרְעָם, לְעֶגְלָה אֵשֶׁת דָּוִד; אֵלֶּה יֻלְּדוּ לְדָוִד, בְּחֶבְרוֹן. | and the sixth, Ithream, of Eglah David's wife. These were born to David in Hebron.

text_he: ויסף יהוה קרא עוד שמואל ויקם שמואל וילך אל-עלי ויאמר הני כי קראת לי ויאמר לא-קראתי בני שוב שכב | And the LORD called yet again Samuel And Samuel arose and went to Eli and said 'Here am I for thou didst call me' And he answered 'I called not my son lie down again' | ויהי בהיות המלחמה בין בית שאול ובין בית דוד ואבנר היה מתחזק בית שאול | And it came to pass while there was war between the house of Saul and the house of David that Abner showed himself strong in the house of Saul
text_en: And the LORD called yet again Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And he answered: 'I called not, my son; lie down again.'
text_pisuk: וַיֹּסֶף יְהוָה, קְרֹא עוֹד שְׁמוּאֵל, וַיָּקָם שְׁמוּאֵל וַיֵּלֶךְ אֶל-עֵלִי, וַיֹּאמֶר הִנְנִי כִּי קָרָאתָ לִי; וַיֹּאמֶר לֹא-קָרָאתִי בְנִי, שׁוּב שְׁכָב. | And the LORD called yet again Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And he answered: 'I called not, my son; lie down again.' | וַיְהִי, בִּהְיוֹת הַמִּלְחָמָה, בֵּין בֵּית שָׁאוּל, וּבֵין בֵּית דָּוִד; וְאַבְנֵר הָיָה מִתְחַזֵּק, בְּבֵית שָׁאוּל. | And it came to pass, while there was war between the house of Saul and the house of David, that Abner showed himself strong in the house of Saul.

text_he: ושמואל טרם ידע את-יהוה וטרם יגלה אליו דבר-יהוה | Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD neither was the word of the LORD yet revealed unto him | ולשאול פלגש ושמה רצפה בת-איה ויאמר אל-אבנר מדוע באתה אל-פילגש אבי | Now Saul had a concubine whose name was Rizpah the daughter of Aiah and said to Abner 'Wherefore hast thou gone in unto my father's concubine'
text_en: Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD, neither was the word of the LORD yet revealed unto him.
text_pisuk: וּשְׁמוּאֵל, טֶרֶם יָדַע אֶת-יְהוָה; וְטֶרֶם יִגָּלֶה אֵלָיו, דְּבַר-יְהוָה. | Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD, neither was the word of the LORD yet revealed unto him. | וּלְשָׁאוּל פִּלֶגֶשׁ, וּשְׁמָהּ רִצְפָּה בַת-אַיָּה; וַיֹּאמֶר, אֶל-אַבְנֵר, מַדּוּעַ בָּאתָה, אֶל-פִּילֶגֶשׁ אָבִי. | Now Saul had a concubine, whose name was Rizpah, the daughter of Aiah; and said to Abner: 'Wherefore hast thou gone in unto my father's concubine?'

text_he: ויסף יהוה קרא-שמואל בשלישת ויקם וילך אל-עלי ויאמר הני כי קראת לי ויבן עלי כי יהוה קרא לנער | And the LORD called Samuel again the third time And he arose and went to Eli and said 'Here am I for thou didst call me' And Eli perceived that the LORD was calling the child | ויחר לאבנר מאד על-דברי איש-בשת ויאמר הראש כלב אנכי אשר ליהודה היום אעשה-חסד עם-בית שאול אביך אל-אחיו ואל-מרעהו ולא המציתך ביד-דוד ותפקד עלי עון האשה היום | Then was Abner very wroth for the words of Ish-bosheth and said 'Am I a dog's head that belongeth to Judah This day do I show kindness unto the house of Saul thy father to his brethren and to his friends and have not delivered thee into the hand of David and yet thou chargest me this day with a fault concerning this woman{S}
text_en: And the LORD called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And Eli perceived that the LORD was calling the child.
text_pisuk: וַיֹּסֶף יְהוָה קְרֹא-שְׁמוּאֵל, בַּשְּׁלִישִׁת, וַיָּקָם וַיֵּלֶךְ אֶל-עֵלִי, וַיֹּאמֶר הִנְנִי כִּי קָרָאתָ לִי; וַיָּבֶן עֵלִי, כִּי יְהוָה קֹרֵא לַנָּעַר. | And the LORD called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said: 'Here am I; for thou didst call me.' And Eli perceived that the LORD was calling the child. | וַיִּחַר לְאַבְנֵר מְאֹד עַל-דִּבְרֵי אִישׁ-בֹּשֶׁת, וַיֹּאמֶר הֲרֹאשׁ כֶּלֶב אָנֹכִי אֲשֶׁר לִיהוּדָה, הַיּוֹם אֶעֱשֶׂה-חֶסֶד עִם-בֵּית שָׁאוּל אָבִיךָ אֶל-אֶחָיו וְאֶל-מֵרֵעֵהוּ, וְלֹא הִמְצִיתִךָ בְּיַד-דָּוִד; וַתִּפְקֹד עָלַי עֲון הָאִשָּׁה, הַיּוֹם. | Then was Abner very wroth for the words of Ish-bosheth, and said: 'Am I a dog's head that belongeth to Judah? This day do I show kindness unto the house of Saul thy father, to his brethren, and to his friends, and have not delivered thee into the hand of David, and yet thou chargest me this day with a fault concerning this woman.{S}
